21 /*
22  * IMPORTANT NOTICE
23  *
24  * This C++ header defines C++ wrapper classes around the OCILIB C API
25  * It requires a compatible version of OCILIB
26  *
27  */

29 namespace ocilib
30 {

32 /* ********************************************************************************************* *
33  * IMPLEMENTATION
34  * ********************************************************************************************* */
35 
36 template<class TResultType>
37 inline TResultType Check(TResultType result)
38 {
39  OCI_Error *err = OCI_GetLastError();
40 
41  if (err)
42  {
43  throw Exception(err);
44  }
45 
46  return result;
47 }
48 
49 inline ostring MakeString(const otext *result)
50 {
51  return ostring(result ? result : ostring());
52 }
53 
54 inline Raw MakeRaw(void *result, unsigned int size)
55 {
56  unsigned char *ptr = static_cast<unsigned char *>(result);
57 
58  return (ptr ? Raw(ptr, ptr + size) : Raw());
59 }
60 
61 template <class StringClass, class CharType>
62 inline void ConverString(StringClass &dest, const CharType *src, size_t length)
63 {
64  size_t i = 0;
65 
66  dest.clear();
67 
68  if (src)
69  {
70  dest.resize(length);
71 
72  while (i < length)
73  {
74  dest[i] = static_cast<typename StringClass::value_type>(src[i]);
75 
76  ++i;
77  }
78  }
79 }
80 
81 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
82  * Enum
83  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
84 
85 template<class TEnum>
86 inline Enum<TEnum>::Enum(void) : _value(0)
87 {
88 }
89 
90 template<class TEnum>
91 inline Enum<TEnum>::Enum(TEnum value) : _value(value)
92 {
93 }
94 
95 template<class TEnum>
96 inline TEnum Enum<TEnum>::GetValue()
97 {
98  return _value;
99 }
100 
101 template<class TEnum>
102 inline Enum<TEnum>::operator TEnum ()
103 {
104  return GetValue();
105 }
106 
107 template<class TEnum>
108 inline Enum<TEnum>::operator unsigned int ()
109 {
110  return static_cast<unsigned int>(_value);
111 }
112 
113 template<class TEnum>
114 inline bool Enum<TEnum>::operator == (const Enum& other) const
115 {
116  return other._value == _value;
117 }
118 
119 template<class TEnum>
120 inline bool Enum<TEnum>::operator != (const Enum& other) const
121 {
122  return !(*this == other);
123 }
124 
125 template<class TEnum>
126 inline bool Enum<TEnum>::operator == (const TEnum& other) const
127 {
128  return other == _value;
129 }
130 
131 template<class TEnum>
132 inline bool Enum<TEnum>::operator != (const TEnum& other) const
133 {
134  return !(*this == other);
135 }
136 
137 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
138  * Flags
139  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
140 
141 template<class TEnum>
142 inline Flags<TEnum>::Flags(void) : _flags(static_cast<TEnum>(0))
143 {
144 }
145 
146 template<class TEnum>
147 inline Flags<TEnum>::Flags(TEnum flag) : _flags( flag)
148 {
149 }
150 
151 template<class TEnum>
152 inline Flags<TEnum>::Flags(const Flags& other) : _flags(other._flags)
153 {
154 }
155 
156 template<class TEnum>
157 inline Flags<TEnum>::Flags(unsigned int flag) : _flags(static_cast<TEnum>(flag))
158 {
159 }
160 
161 template<class TEnum>
162 inline Flags<TEnum> Flags<TEnum>::operator~ () const
163 {
164  return Flags<TEnum>(~_flags);
165 }
166 
167 template<class TEnum>
168 inline Flags<TEnum> Flags<TEnum>::operator | (const Flags& other) const
169 {
170  return Flags<TEnum>(_flags | other._flags);
171 }
172 
173 template<class TEnum>
174 inline Flags<TEnum> Flags<TEnum>::operator & (const Flags& other) const
175 {
176  return Flags<TEnum>(_flags & other._flags);
177 }
178 
179 template<class TEnum>
180 inline Flags<TEnum> Flags<TEnum>::operator ^ (const Flags& other) const
181 {
182  return Flags<TEnum>(_flags ^ other._flags);
183 }
184 
185 template<class TEnum>
186 inline Flags<TEnum> Flags<TEnum>::operator | (TEnum other) const
187 {
188  return Flags<TEnum>(_flags | other);
189 }
190 
191 template<class TEnum>
192 inline Flags<TEnum> Flags<TEnum>::operator & (TEnum other) const
193 {
194  return Flags<TEnum>(_flags & other);
195 }
196 
197 template<class TEnum>
198 inline Flags<TEnum> Flags<TEnum>::operator ^ (TEnum other) const
199 {
200  return Flags<TEnum>(_flags ^ other);
201 }
202 
203 template<class TEnum>
204 inline Flags<TEnum>& Flags<TEnum>::operator |= (const Flags<TEnum>& other)
205 {
206  _flags |= other._flags;
207  return *this;
208 }
209 
210 template<class TEnum>
211 inline Flags<TEnum>& Flags<TEnum>::operator &= (const Flags<TEnum>& other)
212 {
213  _flags &= other._flags;
214  return *this;
215 }
216 
217 template<class TEnum>
218 inline Flags<TEnum>& Flags<TEnum>::operator ^= (const Flags<TEnum>& other)
219 {
220  _flags ^= other._flags;
221  return *this;
222 }
223 
224 template<class TEnum>
225 inline Flags<TEnum>& Flags<TEnum>::operator |= (TEnum other)
226 {
227  _flags |= other;
228  return *this;
229 }
230 
231 template<class TEnum>
232 inline Flags<TEnum>& Flags<TEnum>::operator &= (TEnum other)
233 {
234  _flags &= other;
235  return *this;
236 }
237 
238 template<class TEnum>
239 inline Flags<TEnum>& Flags<TEnum>::operator ^= (TEnum other)
240 {
241  _flags ^= other;
242  return *this;
243 }
244 
245 template<class TEnum>
246 inline bool Flags<TEnum>::operator == (TEnum other) const
247 {
248  return _flags == static_cast<unsigned int>(other);
249 }
250 
251 template<class TEnum>
252 inline bool Flags<TEnum>::operator == (const Flags& other) const
253 {
254  return _flags == other._flags;
255 }
256 
257 template<class TEnum>
258 inline bool Flags<TEnum>::IsSet(TEnum other) const
259 {
260  return ((_flags & other) == _flags);
261 }
262 
263 template<class TEnum>
264 inline unsigned int Flags<TEnum>::GetValues() const
265 {
266  return _flags;
267 }
268 
269 #define OCI_DEFINE_FLAG_OPERATORS(TEnum) \
270 inline Flags<TEnum> operator | (TEnum a, TEnum b) { return Flags<TEnum>(a) | Flags<TEnum>(b); } \
271 
272 OCI_DEFINE_FLAG_OPERATORS(Environment::EnvironmentFlagsValues)
273 OCI_DEFINE_FLAG_OPERATORS(Environment::SessionFlagsValues)
274 OCI_DEFINE_FLAG_OPERATORS(Environment::StartFlagsValues)
275 OCI_DEFINE_FLAG_OPERATORS(Environment::StartModeValues)
276 OCI_DEFINE_FLAG_OPERATORS(Environment::ShutdownModeValues)
277 OCI_DEFINE_FLAG_OPERATORS(Environment::ShutdownFlagsValues)
278 OCI_DEFINE_FLAG_OPERATORS(Environment::AllocatedBytesValues)
279 OCI_DEFINE_FLAG_OPERATORS(Transaction::TransactionFlagsValues)
280 OCI_DEFINE_FLAG_OPERATORS(Column::PropertyFlagsValues)
281 OCI_DEFINE_FLAG_OPERATORS(Subscription::ChangeTypesValues)

283 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
284  * ManagedBuffer
285  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
286 
287 template< typename TBufferType>
288 inline ManagedBuffer<TBufferType>::ManagedBuffer() : _buffer(NULL), _size(0)
289 {
290 }
291 
292 template< typename TBufferType>
293 inline ManagedBuffer<TBufferType>::ManagedBuffer(TBufferType *buffer, size_t size) : _buffer(buffer), _size(size)
294 {
295 }
296 
297 template< typename TBufferType>
298 inline ManagedBuffer<TBufferType>::ManagedBuffer(size_t size) : _buffer(new TBufferType[size]), _size(size)
299 {
300  memset(_buffer, 0, sizeof(TBufferType) * _size);
301 }
302 template< typename TBufferType>
303 inline ManagedBuffer<TBufferType>::~ManagedBuffer()
304 {
305  delete [] _buffer;
306 }
307 
308 template< typename TBufferType>
309 inline ManagedBuffer<TBufferType>::operator TBufferType* () const
310 {
311  return _buffer;
312 }
313 
314 template< typename TBufferType>
315 inline ManagedBuffer<TBufferType>::operator const TBufferType* () const
316 {
317  return _buffer;
318 }
319 
320 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
321  * Handle
322  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
323 
324 template<class THandleType>
325 inline HandleHolder<THandleType>::HandleHolder() : _smartHandle(0)
326 {
327 }
328 
329 template<class THandleType>
330 inline HandleHolder<THandleType>::HandleHolder(const HandleHolder &other) : _smartHandle(0)
331 {
332  Acquire(other, 0, 0, other._smartHandle ? other._smartHandle->GetParent() : 0);
333 }
334 
335 template<class THandleType>
336 inline HandleHolder<THandleType>::~HandleHolder()
337 {
338  Release();
339 }
340 
341 template<class THandleType>
342 inline HandleHolder<THandleType>& HandleHolder<THandleType>::operator = (const HandleHolder<THandleType> &other)
343 {
344  Acquire(other, 0, 0, other._smartHandle ? other._smartHandle->GetParent() : 0);
345  return *this;
346 }
347 
348 template<class THandleType>
349 inline bool HandleHolder<THandleType>::IsNull() const
350 {
351  return (static_cast<THandleType>(*this) == 0);
352 }
353 
354 template<class THandleType>
355 inline HandleHolder<THandleType>::operator THandleType()
356 {
357  return _smartHandle ? _smartHandle->GetHandle() : 0;
358 }
359 
360 template<class THandleType>
361 inline HandleHolder<THandleType>::operator THandleType() const
362 {
363  return _smartHandle ? _smartHandle->GetHandle() : 0;
364 }
365 
366 template<class THandleType>
367 inline HandleHolder<THandleType>::operator bool()
368 {
369  return !IsNull();
370 }
371 
372 template<class THandleType>
373 inline HandleHolder<THandleType>::operator bool() const
374 {
375  return !IsNull();
376 }
377 
378 template<class THandleType>
379 inline Handle * HandleHolder<THandleType>::GetHandle() const
380 {
381  return static_cast<Handle *>(_smartHandle);
382 }
383 
384 template<class THandleType>
385 inline void HandleHolder<THandleType>::Acquire(THandleType handle, HandleFreeFunc handleFreefunc, SmartHandleFreeNotifyFunc freeNotifyFunc, Handle *parent)
386 {
387  Release();
388 
389  if (handle)
390  {
391  _smartHandle = Environment::GetSmartHandle<typename HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle*>(handle);
392 
393  if (!_smartHandle)
394  {
395  _smartHandle = new SmartHandle(this, handle, handleFreefunc, freeNotifyFunc, parent);
396  }
397  else
398  {
399  _smartHandle->Acquire(this);
400  }
401  }
402 }
403 
404 template<class THandleType>
405 inline void HandleHolder<THandleType>::Acquire(HandleHolder<THandleType> &other)
406 {
407  if (&other != this && _smartHandle != other._smartHandle)
408  {
409  Release();
410 
411  if (other._smartHandle)
412  {
413  other._smartHandle->Acquire(this);
414  _smartHandle = other._smartHandle;
415  }
416  }
417 }
418 
419 template<class THandleType>
420 inline void HandleHolder<THandleType>::Release()
421 {
422  if (_smartHandle)
423  {
424  _smartHandle->Release(this);
425  }
426 
427  _smartHandle = 0;
428 }
429 
430 inline Locker::Locker() : _mutex(0)
431 {
432  SetAccessMode(false);
433 }
434 
435 inline Locker::~Locker()
436 {
437  SetAccessMode(false);
438 }
439 
440 inline void Locker::SetAccessMode(bool threaded)
441 {
442  if (threaded && !_mutex)
443  {
444  _mutex = Mutex::Create();
445  }
446  else if (!threaded && _mutex)
447  {
448  Mutex::Destroy(_mutex);
449  _mutex = 0;
450  }
451 }
452 
453 inline void Locker::Lock()
454 {
455  if (_mutex)
456  {
457  Mutex::Acquire(_mutex);
458  }
459 }
460 
461 inline void Locker::Unlock()
462 {
463  if (_mutex)
464  {
465  Mutex::Release(_mutex);
466  }
467 }
468 
469 inline Lockable::Lockable() : _locker(0)
470 {
471 
472 }
473 
474 inline Lockable::~Lockable()
475 {
476 
477 }
478 
479 inline void Lockable::Lock()
480 {
481  if (_locker)
482  {
483  _locker->Lock();
484  }
485 }
486 
487 inline void Lockable::Unlock()
488 {
489  if (_locker)
490  {
491  _locker->Unlock();
492  }
493 }
494 
495 inline void Lockable::SetLocker(Locker *locker)
496 {
497  _locker = locker;
498 }
499 
500 template <class TKey, class TValue>
501 inline ConcurrentMap<TKey, TValue>::ConcurrentMap()
502 {
503 
504 }
505 
506 template <class TKey, class TValue>
507 inline ConcurrentMap<TKey, TValue>::~ConcurrentMap()
508 {
509  Clear();
510 }
511 
512 template <class TKey, class TValue>
513 inline void ConcurrentMap<TKey, TValue>::Remove(TKey key)
514 {
515  Lock();
516  _map.erase(key);
517  Unlock();
518 }
519 
520 template <class TKey, class TValue>
521 inline TValue ConcurrentMap<TKey, TValue>::Get(TKey key)
522 {
523  TValue value = 0;
524 
525  Lock();
526  typename std::map< TKey, TValue >::const_iterator it = _map.find(key);
527  if (it != _map.end())
528  {
529  value = it->second;
530  }
531  Unlock();
532 
533  return value;
534 }
535 
536 template <class TKey, class TValue>
537 inline void ConcurrentMap<TKey, TValue>::Set(TKey key, TValue value)
538 {
539  Lock();
540  _map[key] = value;
541  Unlock();
542 }
543 
544 template <class TKey, class TValue>
545 inline void ConcurrentMap<TKey, TValue>::Clear()
546 {
547  Lock();
548  _map.clear();
549  Unlock();
550 }
551 
552 template <class TKey, class TValue>
553 inline size_t ConcurrentMap<TKey, TValue>::GetSize()
554 {
555  size_t size = 0;
556  Lock();
557  size = _map.size();
558  Unlock();
559 
560  return size;
561 }
562 
563 template <class TValue>
564 inline ConcurrentList<TValue>::ConcurrentList()
565 {
566 
567 }
568 
569 template <class TValue>
570 inline ConcurrentList<TValue>::~ConcurrentList()
571 {
572  Clear();
573 }
574 
575 template <class TValue>
576 inline void ConcurrentList<TValue>::Add(TValue value)
577 {
578  Lock();
579  _list.push_back(value);
580  Unlock();
581 }
582 
583 template <class TValue>
584 inline void ConcurrentList<TValue>::Remove(TValue value)
585 {
586  Lock();
587  _list.remove(value);
588  Unlock();
589 }
590 
591 template <class TValue>
592 inline void ConcurrentList<TValue>::Clear()
593 {
594  Lock();
595  _list.clear();
596  Unlock();
597 }
598 
599 template <class TValue>
600 inline size_t ConcurrentList<TValue>::GetSize()
601 {
602  size_t size = 0;
603  Lock();
604  size = _list.size();
605  Unlock();
606 
607  return size;
608 }
609 
610 template <class TValue>
611 inline bool ConcurrentList<TValue>::Exists(TValue value)
612 {
613  bool res = 0;
614  Lock();
615 
616  for (typename std::list<TValue>::iterator it1 = _list.begin(), it2 = _list.end(); it1 != it2; ++it1)
617  {
618  if (*it1 == value)
619  {
620  res = true;
621  break;
622  }
623  }
624 
625  Unlock();
626 
627  return res;
628 }
629 
630 template <class TValue>
631 template <class TPredicate>
632 inline bool ConcurrentList<TValue>::FindIf(TPredicate predicate, TValue &value)
633 {
634  bool res = 0;
635  Lock();
636 
637  for (typename std::list<TValue>::iterator it1 = _list.begin(), it2 = _list.end(); it1 != it2; ++it1)
638  {
639  if (predicate(*it1))
640  {
641  value = *it1;
642  res = true;
643  break;
644  }
645  }
646 
647  Unlock();
648 
649  return res;
650 }
651 
652 template <class TValue>
653 template <class TAction>
654 inline void ConcurrentList<TValue>::ForEach(TAction action)
655 {
656  Lock();
657 
658  for (typename std::list<TValue>::iterator it1 = _list.begin(), it2 = _list.end(); it1 != it2; ++it1)
659  {
660  action(*it1);
661  }
662 
663  Unlock();
664 }
665 
666 template <class THandleType>
667 inline HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle::SmartHandle
668 (
669  HandleHolder *holder, THandleType handle, HandleFreeFunc handleFreefunc,
670  SmartHandleFreeNotifyFunc freeNotifyFunc, Handle *parent
671 )
672  : _holders(), _children(), _locker(), _handle(handle), _handleFreeFunc(handleFreefunc),
673  _freeNotifyFunc(freeNotifyFunc), _parent(parent), _extraInfo(0)
674 {
675  _locker.SetAccessMode((Environment::GetMode() & Environment::Threaded) == Environment::Threaded);
676 
677  _holders.SetLocker(&_locker);
678  _children.SetLocker(&_locker);
679 
680  Environment::SetSmartHandle<typename HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle*>(handle, this);
681 
682  Acquire(holder);
683 
684  if (_parent && _handle)
685  {
686  _parent->GetChildren().Add(this);
687  }
688 }
689 
690 template <class THandleType>
691 inline HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle::~SmartHandle()
692 {
693  boolean ret = TRUE;
694  boolean chk = FALSE;
695 
696  if (_parent && _handle)
697  {
698  _parent->GetChildren().Remove(this);
699  }
700 
701  _children.ForEach(DeleteHandle);
702  _children.Clear();
703 
704  _holders.SetLocker(0);
705  _children.SetLocker(0);
706 
707  Environment::SetSmartHandle<typename HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle*>(_handle, 0);
708 
709  if (_freeNotifyFunc)
710  {
711  _freeNotifyFunc(this);
712  }
713 
714  if (_handleFreeFunc && _handle)
715  {
716  ret = _handleFreeFunc(_handle);
717  chk = TRUE;
718  }
719 
720  if (chk)
721  {
722  Check(ret);
723  }
724 }
725 
726 template <class THandleType>
727 inline void HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle::DeleteHandle(Handle *handle)
728 {
729  if (handle)
730  {
731  handle->DetachFromParent();
732  handle->DetachFromHolders();
733 
734  delete handle;
735  }
736 }
737 
738 template <class THandleType>
739 inline void HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle::ResetHolder(HandleHolder *holder)
740 {
741  if (holder)
742  {
743  holder->_smartHandle = 0;
744  }
745 }
746 
747 template <class THandleType>
748 inline void HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle::Acquire(HandleHolder *holder)
749 {
750  _holders.Add(holder);
751 }
752 
753 template <class THandleType>
754 inline void HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle::Release(HandleHolder *holder)
755 {
756  _holders.Remove(holder);
757 
758  if (_holders.GetSize() == 0)
759  {
760  delete this;
761  }
762 
763  holder->_smartHandle = 0;
764 }
765 
766 template <class THandleType>
767 inline const THandleType HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle::GetHandle() const
768 {
769  return _handle;
770 }
771 
772 template <class THandleType>
773 inline Handle * HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle::GetParent() const
774 {
775  return _parent;
776 }
777 
778 template <class THandleType>
779 inline AnyPointer HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle::GetExtraInfos() const
780 {
781  return _extraInfo;
782 }
783 
784 template <class THandleType>
785 inline void HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle::SetExtraInfos(AnyPointer extraInfo)
786 {
787  _extraInfo = extraInfo;
788 }
789 
790 template <class THandleType>
791 inline ConcurrentList<Handle *> & HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle::GetChildren()
792 {
793  return _children;
794 }
795 
796 template <class THandleType>
797 inline void HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle::DetachFromHolders()
798 {
799  _holders.ForEach(ResetHolder);
800  _holders.Clear();
801 }
802 
803 template <class THandleType>
804 inline void HandleHolder<THandleType>::SmartHandle::DetachFromParent()
805 {
806  _parent = 0;
807 }
808 
809 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
810  * Exception
811  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
812 
813 inline Exception::Exception()
814  : _what(),
815  _pStatement(0),
816  _pConnnection(0),
817  _row(0),
818  _type(static_cast<ExceptionType::type>(0)),
819  _errLib(0),
820  _errOracle(0)
821 {
822 
823 }
824 
825 inline Exception::~Exception() throw ()
826 {
827 
828 }
829 
830 inline Exception::Exception(OCI_Error *err)
831  : _what(),
832  _pStatement(OCI_ErrorGetStatement(err)),
833  _pConnnection(OCI_ErrorGetConnection(err)),
834  _row(OCI_ErrorGetRow(err)),
835  _type(static_cast<ExceptionType::type>(OCI_ErrorGetType(err))),
836  _errLib(OCI_ErrorGetInternalCode(err)),
837  _errOracle(OCI_ErrorGetOCICode(err))
838 {
839  const otext *str = OCI_ErrorGetString(err);
840 
841  if (str)
842  {
843  ConverString(_what, str, ostrlen(str));
844  }
845 }
846 
847 inline const char * Exception::what() const throw()
848 {
849  return _what.c_str();
850 }
851 
852 inline ostring Exception::GetMessage() const
853 {
854  ostring message;
855 
856 #ifdef OCI_CHARSET_WIDE
857 
858  ConverString(message, _what.c_str(), _what.size());
859 
860 #else
861 
862  message = _what;
863 
864 #endif
865 
866  return message;
867 }
868 
869 inline Exception::ExceptionType Exception::GetType() const
870 {
871  return _type;
872 }
873 
874 inline int Exception::GetOracleErrorCode() const
875 {
876  return _errOracle;
877 }
878 
879 inline int Exception::GetInternalErrorCode() const
880 {
881  return _errLib;
882 }
883 
884 inline Statement Exception::GetStatement() const
885 {
886  return Statement(_pStatement, 0);
887 }
888 
889 inline Connection Exception::GetConnection() const
890 {
891  return Connection(_pConnnection, 0);
892 }
893 
894 inline unsigned int Exception::GetRow() const
895 {
896  return _row;
897 }
898 
899 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
900  * Environment
901  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
902 
903 inline void Environment::Initialize(EnvironmentFlags mode, const ostring& libpath)
904 {
905  GetInstance().SelfInitialize(mode, libpath);
906 }
907 
908 inline void Environment::Cleanup()
909 {
910  GetInstance().SelfCleanup();
911 }
912 
913 inline Environment::EnvironmentFlags Environment::GetMode()
914 {
915  return GetInstance()._mode;
916 }
917 
918 inline Environment::ImportMode Environment::GetImportMode()
919 {
920  return ImportMode(static_cast<ImportMode::type>(Check(OCI_GetImportMode())));
921 }
922 
923 inline Environment::CharsetMode Environment::GetCharset()
924 {
925  return CharsetMode(static_cast<CharsetMode::type>(Check(OCI_GetCharset())));
926 }

928 inline big_uint Environment::GetAllocatedBytes(AllocatedBytesFlags type)
929 {
930  return Check(OCI_GetAllocatedBytes(type.GetValues()));
931 }
932 
933 inline bool Environment::Initialized()
934 {
935  return GetInstance()._initialized;
936 }
937 
938 inline OracleVersion Environment::GetCompileVersion()
939 {
940  return OracleVersion(static_cast<OracleVersion::type>(Check(OCI_GetOCICompileVersion())));
941 }
942 
943 inline OracleVersion Environment::GetRuntimeVersion()
944 {
945  return OracleVersion(static_cast<OracleVersion::type>(Check(OCI_GetOCIRuntimeVersion())));
946 }

950  return OCI_VER_MAJ(Check(OCI_GetOCICompileVersion()));
951 }

974 {

978 inline void Environment::EnableWarnings(bool value)
979 {
980  OCI_EnableWarnings(static_cast<boolean>(value));
981 }

983 inline bool Environment::SetFormat(FormatType formatType, const ostring& format)
984 {
985  return Check(OCI_SetFormat(NULL, formatType, format.c_str()) == TRUE);
986 }
987 
988 inline ostring Environment::GetFormat(FormatType formatType)
989 {
990  return MakeString(Check(OCI_GetFormat(NULL, formatType)));
991 }
992 
993 inline void Environment::StartDatabase(const ostring& db, const ostring& user, const ostring &pwd, Environment::StartFlags startFlags,
994  Environment::StartMode startMode, Environment::SessionFlags sessionFlags, const ostring& spfile)
995 {
996  Check(OCI_DatabaseStartup(db.c_str(), user.c_str(), pwd.c_str(), sessionFlags.GetValues(),
997  startMode.GetValues(), startFlags.GetValues(), spfile.c_str() ));
998 }
999 
1000 inline void Environment::ShutdownDatabase(const ostring& db, const ostring& user, const ostring &pwd, Environment::ShutdownFlags shutdownFlags,
1001  Environment::ShutdownMode shutdownMode, Environment::SessionFlags sessionFlags)
1002 {
1003  Check(OCI_DatabaseShutdown(db.c_str(), user.c_str(), pwd.c_str(), sessionFlags.GetValues(),
1004  shutdownMode.GetValues(), shutdownFlags.GetValues() ));
1005 }
1006 
1007 inline void Environment::ChangeUserPassword(const ostring& db, const ostring& user, const ostring& pwd, const ostring& newPwd)
1008 {
1009  Check(OCI_SetUserPassword(db.c_str(), user.c_str(), pwd.c_str(), newPwd.c_str()));
1010 }
1011 
1012 inline void Environment::SetHAHandler(HAHandlerProc handler)
1013 {
1014  Check(OCI_SetHAHandler(static_cast<POCI_HA_HANDLER>(handler != 0 ? Environment::HAHandler : 0)));
1015 
1016  Environment::SetUserCallback<HAHandlerProc>(GetEnvironmentHandle(), handler);
1017 }
1018 
1019 inline void Environment::HAHandler(OCI_Connection *pConnection, unsigned int source, unsigned int event, OCI_Timestamp *pTimestamp)
1020 {
1021  HAHandlerProc handler = Environment::GetUserCallback<HAHandlerProc>(GetEnvironmentHandle());
1022 
1023  if (handler)
1024  {
1025  Connection connection(pConnection, 0);
1026  Timestamp timestamp(pTimestamp, connection.GetHandle());
1027 
1028  handler(connection,
1029  HAEventSource(static_cast<HAEventSource::type>(source)),
1030  HAEventType (static_cast<HAEventType::type> (event)),
1031  timestamp);
1032  }
1033 }
1034 
1035 inline unsigned int Environment::TAFHandler(OCI_Connection *pConnection, unsigned int type, unsigned int event)
1036 {
1037  unsigned int res = OCI_FOC_OK;
1038 
1039  Connection::TAFHandlerProc handler = Environment::GetUserCallback<Connection::TAFHandlerProc>(Check(pConnection));
1040 
1041  if (handler)
1042  {
1043  Connection connection(pConnection, 0);
1044 
1045  res = handler(connection,
1046  Connection::FailoverRequest( static_cast<Connection::FailoverRequest::type> (type)),
1047  Connection::FailoverEvent ( static_cast<Connection::FailoverEvent::type> (event)));
1048  }
1049 
1050  return res;
1051 }
1052 
1053 inline void Environment::NotifyHandler(OCI_Event *pEvent)
1054 {
1055  Subscription::NotifyHandlerProc handler = Environment::GetUserCallback<Subscription::NotifyHandlerProc>((Check(OCI_EventGetSubscription(pEvent))));
1056 
1057  if (handler)
1058  {
1059  Event evt(pEvent);
1060  handler(evt);
1061  }
1062 }
1063 
1064 inline void Environment::NotifyHandlerAQ(OCI_Dequeue *pDequeue)
1065 {
1066  Dequeue::NotifyAQHandlerProc handler = Environment::GetUserCallback<Dequeue::NotifyAQHandlerProc>(Check(pDequeue));
1067 
1068  if (handler)
1069  {
1070  Dequeue dequeue(pDequeue);
1071  handler(dequeue);
1072  }
1073 }
1074 
1075 template <class TCallbackType>
1076 inline TCallbackType Environment::GetUserCallback(AnyPointer ptr)
1077 {
1078  return reinterpret_cast<TCallbackType>(GetInstance()._callbacks.Get(ptr));
1079 }
1080 
1081 template <class TCallbackType>
1082 inline void Environment::SetUserCallback(AnyPointer ptr, TCallbackType callback)
1083 {
1084  if (callback)
1085  {
1086  GetInstance()._callbacks.Set(ptr, reinterpret_cast<CallbackPointer>(callback));
1087  }
1088  else
1089  {
1090  GetInstance()._callbacks.Remove(ptr);
1091  }
1092 }
1093 
1094 template <class THandleType>
1095 inline void Environment::SetSmartHandle(AnyPointer ptr, THandleType handle)
1096 {
1097  if (handle)
1098  {
1099  GetInstance()._handles.Set(ptr, handle);
1100  }
1101  else
1102  {
1103  GetInstance()._handles.Remove(ptr);
1104  }
1105 }
1106 
1107 template <class THandleType>
1108 inline THandleType Environment::GetSmartHandle(AnyPointer ptr)
1109 {
1110  return dynamic_cast<THandleType>(GetInstance()._handles.Get(ptr));
1111 }
1112 
1113 inline Handle * Environment::GetEnvironmentHandle()
1114 {
1115  return GetInstance()._handle.GetHandle();
1116 }
1117 
1118 inline Environment& Environment::GetInstance()
1119 {
1120  static Environment envHandle;
1121 
1122  return envHandle;
1123 }
1124 
1125 inline Environment::Environment() : _locker(), _handle(), _handles(), _callbacks(), _mode(), _initialized(false)
1126 {
1127 
1128 }
1129 
1130 inline void Environment::SelfInitialize(EnvironmentFlags mode, const ostring& libpath)
1131 {
1132  _mode = mode;
1133 
1134  Check(OCI_Initialize(0, libpath.c_str(), _mode.GetValues() | OCI_ENV_CONTEXT));
1135 
1136  _initialized = true;
1137 
1138  _locker.SetAccessMode((_mode & Environment::Threaded) == Environment::Threaded);
1139 
1140  _callbacks.SetLocker(&_locker);
1141  _handles.SetLocker(&_locker);
1142 
1143  _handle.Acquire(const_cast<AnyPointer>(Check(OCI_HandleGetEnvironment())), 0, 0, 0);
1144 }
1145 
1146 inline void Environment::SelfCleanup()
1147 {
1148  _locker.SetAccessMode(false);
1149 
1150  _callbacks.SetLocker(0);
1151  _handles.SetLocker(0);
1152 
1153  _handle.Release();
1154 
1155  if (_initialized)
1156  {
1157  Check(OCI_Cleanup());
1158  }
1159 
1160  _initialized = false;
1161 }
1162 
1163 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
1164  * Mutex
1165  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
1166 
1167 inline MutexHandle Mutex::Create()
1168 {
1169  return Environment::GetInstance().Initialized() ? Check(OCI_MutexCreate()) : 0;
1170 }
1171 
1172 inline void Mutex::Destroy(MutexHandle mutex)
1173 {
1174  Check(OCI_MutexFree(mutex));
1175 }
1176 
1177 inline void Mutex::Acquire(MutexHandle mutex)
1178 {
1179  Check(OCI_MutexAcquire(mutex));
1180 }
1181 
1182 inline void Mutex::Release(MutexHandle mutex)
1183 {
1184  Check(OCI_MutexRelease(mutex));
1185 }
1186

1199 }

1204 }

1207 {
1208  Check(OCI_ThreadJoin(handle));
1209 }

1214 }

1243 
1244 inline Pool::Pool(const ostring& db, const ostring& user, const ostring& pwd, Pool::PoolType poolType,
1245  unsigned int minSize, unsigned int maxSize, unsigned int increment, Environment::SessionFlags sessionFlags)
1246 {
1247  Open(db, user, pwd, poolType, minSize, maxSize, increment, sessionFlags);
1248 }
1249 
1250 inline void Pool::Open(const ostring& db, const ostring& user, const ostring& pwd, Pool::PoolType poolType,
1251  unsigned int minSize, unsigned int maxSize, unsigned int increment, Environment::SessionFlags sessionFlags)
1252 {
1253  Release();
1254 
1255  Acquire(Check(OCI_PoolCreate(db.c_str(), user.c_str(), pwd.c_str(), poolType, sessionFlags.GetValues(),
1256  minSize, maxSize, increment)), reinterpret_cast<HandleFreeFunc>(OCI_PoolFree), 0, Environment::GetEnvironmentHandle());
1257 }
1258 
1259 inline void Pool::Close()
1260 {
1261  Release();
1262 }
1263 
1264 inline Connection Pool::GetConnection(const ostring& sessionTag)
1265 {
1266  return Connection(Check( OCI_PoolGetConnection(*this, sessionTag.c_str())), GetHandle());
1267 }

1333 inline Connection::Connection(const ostring& db, const ostring& user, const ostring& pwd, Environment::SessionFlags sessionFlags)
1334 {
1335  Open(db, user, pwd, sessionFlags);
1336 }
1337 
1338 inline Connection::Connection(OCI_Connection *con, Handle *parent)
1339 {
1340  Acquire(con, reinterpret_cast<HandleFreeFunc>(parent ? OCI_ConnectionFree : 0), 0, parent);
1341 }
1342 
1343 inline void Connection::Open(const ostring& db, const ostring& user, const ostring& pwd, Environment::SessionFlags sessionFlags)
1344 {
1345  Acquire(Check(OCI_ConnectionCreate(db.c_str(), user.c_str(), pwd.c_str(), sessionFlags.GetValues())),
1346  reinterpret_cast<HandleFreeFunc>(OCI_ConnectionFree), 0, Environment::GetEnvironmentHandle());
1347 }
1348

1350 {
1351  Release();
1352 }

1474 inline bool Connection::GetServerOutput(ostring &line) const
1475 {
1476  const otext * str = Check(OCI_ServerGetOutput(*this));
1477 
1478  line = MakeString(str);
1479 
1480  return (str != 0);
1481 }
1482 
1483 inline void Connection::GetServerOutput(std::vector<ostring> &lines) const
1484 {
1485  const otext * str = Check(OCI_ServerGetOutput(*this));
1486 
1487  while (str)
1488  {
1489  lines.push_back(str);
1490  str = Check(OCI_ServerGetOutput(*this));
1491  }
1492 }

1567

1581 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
1582  * Transaction
1583  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
1584 
1585 inline Transaction::Transaction(const Connection &connection, unsigned int timeout, TransactionFlags flags, OCI_XID *pxid)
1586 {
1587  Acquire(Check(OCI_TransactionCreate(connection, timeout, flags.GetValues(), pxid)), reinterpret_cast<HandleFreeFunc>(OCI_TransactionFree), 0, 0);
1588 }
1589 
1590 inline Transaction::Transaction(OCI_Transaction *trans)
1591 {
1592  Acquire(trans, 0, 0, 0);
1593 }
1594 
1595 inline void Transaction::Prepare()
1596 {
1597  Check(OCI_TransactionPrepare(*this));
1598 }

1617  Check(OCI_TransactionForget(*this));
1618 }
1619 
1620 inline Transaction::TransactionFlags Transaction::GetFlags() const
1621 {

1623 }
1624 
1625 inline unsigned int Transaction::GetTimeout() const
1626 {
1627  return Check(OCI_TransactionGetTimeout(*this));
1628 }

1635 {
1636  if (create)
1637  {
1638  Allocate();
1639  }
1640 }

1643 {

1645 
1646  FromString(str, format);
1647 }

1652

1654 }

1659 }

1661 inline void Date::Allocate()
1662 {
1663  Acquire(Check(OCI_DateCreate(NULL)), reinterpret_cast<HandleFreeFunc>(OCI_DateFree), 0, 0);
1664 }

1666 inline Date Date::SysDate()
1667 {
1668  Date result;
1669 
1670  result.Allocate();
1671 
1672  Check(OCI_DateSysDate(result));
1673 
1674  return result;
1675 }

1678 {
1679  Date result;
1680 
1681  result.Allocate();
1682 
1683  Check(OCI_DateAssign(result, *this));
1684 
1685  return result;
1686 }

1689 {
1690  return Check(OCI_DateCompare(*this, other));
1691 }

1694 {
1695  return (Check(OCI_DateCheck(*this)) == 0);

1866 }
1867 
1868 inline void Date::FromString(const ostring& str, const ostring& format)
1869 {
1870  Check(OCI_DateFromText(*this, str.c_str(), format.size() > 0 ? format.c_str() : Environment::GetFormat(FormatDate).c_str()));
1871 }
1872 
1873 inline ostring Date::ToString(const ostring& format) const
1874 {
1875  if (!IsNull())
1876  {
1877  size_t size = OCI_SIZE_BUFFER;
1878 
1879  ManagedBuffer<otext> buffer(size + 1);
1880 
1881  Check(OCI_DateToText(*this, format.c_str(), static_cast<int>(size), buffer));
1882 
1883  return MakeString(static_cast<const otext *>(buffer));
1884  }
1885 
1886  return OCI_STRING_NULL;
1887 }
1888 
1889 inline ostring Date::ToString() const
1890 {
1891  return ToString(Environment::GetFormat(FormatDate));
1892 }
1893 
1894 inline Date& Date::operator ++ ()
1895 {
1896  return *this += 1;
1897 }
1898 
1899 inline Date Date::operator ++ (int)
1900 {
1901  Date result = Clone();
1902 
1903  *this += 1;
1904 
1905  return result;
1906 }
1907 
1908 inline Date& Date::operator -- ()
1909 {
1910  return *this -= 1;
1911 }
1912 
1913 inline Date Date::operator -- (int)
1914 {
1915  Date result = Clone();
1916 
1917  *this -= 1;
1918 
1919  return result;
1920 }
1921 
1922 inline Date Date::operator + (int value)
1923 {
1924  Date result = Clone();
1925  return result += value;
1926 }
1927 
1928 inline Date Date::operator - (int value)
1929 {
1930  Date result = Clone();
1931  return result -= value;
1932 }
1933 
1934 inline Date& Date::operator += (int value)
1935 {
1936  AddDays(value);
1937  return *this;
1938 }
1939 
1940 inline Date& Date::operator -= (int value)
1941 {
1942  AddDays(-value);
1943  return *this;
1944 }
1945 
1946 inline bool Date::operator == (const Date& other) const
1947 {
1948  return Compare(other) == 0;
1949 }
1950 
1951 inline bool Date::operator != (const Date& other) const
1952 {
1953  return (!(*this == other));
1954 }
1955 
1956 inline bool Date::operator > (const Date& other) const
1957 {
1958  return (Compare(other) > 0);
1959 }
1960 
1961 inline bool Date::operator < (const Date& other) const
1962 {
1963  return (Compare(other) < 0);
1964 }
1965 
1966 inline bool Date::operator >= (const Date& other) const
1967 {
1968  int res = Compare(other);
1969 
1970  return (res == 0 || res < 0);
1971 }
1972 
1973 inline bool Date::operator <= (const Date& other) const
1974 {
1975  int res = Compare(other);
1976 
1977  return (res == 0 || res > 0);
1978 }

2177 inline ostring Interval::ToString(int leadingPrecision, int fractionPrecision) const
2178 {
2179  if (!IsNull())
2180  {
2181  size_t size = OCI_SIZE_BUFFER;
2182 
2183  ManagedBuffer<otext> buffer(size + 1);
2184 
2185  Check(OCI_IntervalToText(*this, leadingPrecision, fractionPrecision, static_cast<int>(size), buffer));
2186 
2187  return MakeString(static_cast<const otext *>(buffer));
2188  }
2189 
2190  return OCI_STRING_NULL;
2191 }

2436 }
2437 
2438 inline void Timestamp::GetTime(int &hour, int &min, int &sec, int &fsec) const
2439 {
2440  Check(OCI_TimestampGetTime(*this, &hour, &min, &sec, &fsec));
2441 }
2442 
2443 inline void Timestamp::GetDateTime(int &year, int &month, int &day, int &hour, int &min, int &sec, int &fsec) const
2444 {
2445  Check(OCI_TimestampGetDateTime(*this, &year, &month, &day, &hour, &min, &sec, &fsec));
2446 }
2447 
2448 inline void Timestamp::SetDate(int year, int month, int day)
2449 {
2450  int tmpYear = 0, tmpMonth = 0, tempDay = 0, hour = 0, minutes = 0, seconds = 0, milliseconds = 0;
2451 
2452  GetDateTime(tmpYear, tmpMonth, tempDay, hour, minutes, seconds, milliseconds);
2453  SetDateTime(year, month, day, hour, minutes, seconds, milliseconds);
2454 }
2455 
2456 inline void Timestamp::SetTime(int hour, int min, int sec, int fsec)
2457 {
2458  int year = 0, month = 0, day = 0, tmpHour = 0, tmpMinutes = 0, tmpSeconds = 0, tmpMilliseconds = 0;
2459 
2460  GetDateTime(year, month, day, tmpHour, tmpMinutes, tmpSeconds, tmpMilliseconds);
2461  SetDateTime(year, month, day, hour, min, sec, fsec);
2462 }
2463 
2464 inline void Timestamp::SetTimeZone(const ostring& timeZone)
2465 {
2466  if (GetType() == Timestamp::WithTimeZone)
2467  {
2468  int year = 0, month = 0, day = 0, hour = 0, minutes = 0, seconds = 0, milliseconds = 0;
2469 
2470  GetDateTime(year, month, day, hour, minutes, seconds, milliseconds);
2471  SetDateTime(year, month, day, hour, minutes, seconds, milliseconds, timeZone);
2472  }
2473 }
2474 
2475 inline ostring Timestamp::GetTimeZone() const
2476 {
2477  if (GetType() != Timestamp::NoTimeZone)
2478  {
2479  size_t size = OCI_SIZE_BUFFER;
2480 
2481  ManagedBuffer<otext> buffer(size + 1);
2482 
2483  Check(OCI_TimestampGetTimeZoneName(*this, static_cast<int>(size), buffer) == TRUE);
2484 
2485  return MakeString(static_cast<const otext *>(buffer));
2486  }
2487  else
2488  {
2489  return ostring();
2490  }
2491 }
2492 
2493 inline void Timestamp::GetTimeZoneOffset(int &hour, int &min) const
2494 {
2495  Check(OCI_TimestampGetTimeZoneOffset(*this, &hour, &min));
2496 }
2497 
2498 inline void Timestamp::Substract(const Timestamp &lsh, const Timestamp &rsh, Interval& result)
2499 {
2500  Check(OCI_TimestampSubtract(lsh, rsh, result));
2501 }
2502 
2503 inline Timestamp Timestamp::SysTimestamp(TimestampType type)
2504 {
2505  Timestamp result(type);
2506 
2507  Check(OCI_TimestampSysTimestamp(result));
2508 
2509  return result;
2510 }
2511 
2512 inline void Timestamp::FromString(const ostring& data, const ostring& format)
2513 {
2514  Check(OCI_TimestampFromText(*this, data.c_str(), format.size() > 0 ? format.c_str() : Environment::GetFormat(FormatTimestamp).c_str()));
2515 }
2516 
2517 inline ostring Timestamp::ToString(const ostring& format, int precision = OCI_STRING_DEFAULT_PREC) const
2518 {
2519  if (!IsNull())
2520  {
2521  size_t size = OCI_SIZE_BUFFER;
2522 
2523  ManagedBuffer<otext> buffer(size + 1);
2524 
2525  Check(OCI_TimestampToText(*this, format.c_str(), static_cast<int>(size), buffer, precision));
2526 
2527  return MakeString(static_cast<const otext *>(buffer));
2528  }
2529 
2530  return OCI_STRING_NULL;
2531 }
2532 
2533 inline ostring Timestamp::ToString() const
2534 {
2535  return ToString(Environment::GetFormat(FormatTimestamp), OCI_STRING_DEFAULT_PREC);
2536 }
2537 
2538 inline Timestamp& Timestamp::operator ++ ()
2539 {
2540  return *this += 1;
2541 }
2542 
2543 inline Timestamp Timestamp::operator ++ (int)
2544 {
2545  Timestamp result = Clone();
2546 
2547  *this += 1;
2548 
2549  return result;
2550 }
2551 
2552 inline Timestamp& Timestamp::operator -- ()
2553 {
2554  return *this -= 1;
2555 }
2556 
2557 inline Timestamp Timestamp::operator -- (int)
2558 {
2559  Timestamp result = Clone();
2560 
2561  *this -= 1;
2562 
2563  return result;
2564 }
2565 
2566 inline Timestamp Timestamp::operator + (int value)
2567 {
2568  Timestamp result = Clone();
2569  Interval interval(Interval::DaySecond);
2570  interval.SetDay(1);
2571  return result += value;
2572 }
2573 
2574 inline Timestamp Timestamp::operator - (int value)
2575 {
2576  Timestamp result = Clone();
2577  Interval interval(Interval::DaySecond);
2578  interval.SetDay(1);
2579  return result -= value;
2580 }
2581 
2582 inline Interval Timestamp::operator - (const Timestamp& other)
2583 {
2584  Interval interval(Interval::DaySecond);
2585  Check(OCI_TimestampSubtract(*this, other, interval));
2586  return interval;
2587 }
2588 
2589 inline Timestamp Timestamp::operator + (const Interval& other)
2590 {
2591  Timestamp result = Clone();
2592  return result += other;
2593 }
2594 
2595 inline Timestamp Timestamp::operator - (const Interval& other)
2596 {
2597  Timestamp result = Clone();
2598  return result -= other;
2599 }
2600 
2601 inline Timestamp& Timestamp::operator += (const Interval& other)
2602 {
2603  Check(OCI_TimestampIntervalAdd(*this, other));
2604  return *this;
2605 }
2606 
2607 inline Timestamp& Timestamp::operator -= (const Interval& other)
2608 {
2609  Check(OCI_TimestampIntervalSub(*this, other));
2610  return *this;
2611 }
2612 
2613 inline Timestamp& Timestamp::operator += (int value)
2614 {
2615  Interval interval(Interval::DaySecond);
2616  interval.SetDay(value);
2617  return *this += interval;
2618 }
2619 
2620 inline Timestamp& Timestamp::operator -= (int value)
2621 {
2622  Interval interval(Interval::DaySecond);
2623  interval.SetDay(value);
2624  return *this -= interval;
2625 }
2626 
2627 inline bool Timestamp::operator == (const Timestamp& other) const
2628 {
2629  return Compare(other) == 0;
2630 }
2631 
2632 inline bool Timestamp::operator != (const Timestamp& other) const
2633 {
2634  return (!(*this == other));
2635 }
2636 
2637 inline bool Timestamp::operator > (const Timestamp& other) const
2638 {
2639  return (Compare(other) > 0);
2640 }
2641 
2642 inline bool Timestamp::operator < (const Timestamp& other) const
2643 {
2644  return (Compare(other) < 0);
2645 }
2646 
2647 inline bool Timestamp::operator >= (const Timestamp& other) const
2648 {
2649  int res = Compare(other);
2650 
2651  return (res == 0 || res < 0);
2652 }
2653 
2654 inline bool Timestamp::operator <= (const Timestamp& other) const
2655 {
2656  int res = Compare(other);
2657 
2658  return (res == 0 || res > 0);
2659 }

2667 {
2668 }
2669

2671 inline Lob<TLobObjectType, TLobOracleType>::Lob(const Connection &connection)
2672 {
2673  Acquire(Check(OCI_LobCreate(connection, TLobOracleType)), reinterpret_cast<HandleFreeFunc>(OCI_LobFree), 0, connection.GetHandle());
2674 }
2675

2677 inline Lob<TLobObjectType, TLobOracleType>::Lob(OCI_Lob *pLob, Handle *parent)
2678 {
2679  Acquire(pLob, 0, 0, parent);
2680 }

2682 template<>
2683 inline ostring Lob<ostring, LobCharacter>::Read(unsigned int length)
2684 {
2685  ManagedBuffer<otext> buffer(length + 1);
2686 
2687  Check(OCI_LobRead(*this, static_cast<AnyPointer>(buffer), length));
2688 
2689  return MakeString(static_cast<const otext *>(buffer));
2690 }

2693 inline ostring Lob<ostring, LobNationalCharacter>::Read(unsigned int length)
2694 {
2695  ManagedBuffer<otext> buffer(length + 1);
2696 
2697  Check(OCI_LobRead(*this, static_cast<AnyPointer>(buffer), length));
2698 
2699  return MakeString(static_cast<const otext *>(buffer));
2700 }
2701 
2702 template<>
2703 inline Raw Lob<Raw, LobBinary>::Read(unsigned int length)
2704 {
2705  ManagedBuffer<unsigned char> buffer(length + 1);
2706 
2707  length = Check(OCI_LobRead(*this, static_cast<AnyPointer>(buffer), length));
2708 
2709  return MakeRaw(buffer, length);
2710 }
2711 
2712 template<class TLobObjectType, int TLobOracleType>
2713 inline unsigned int Lob<TLobObjectType, TLobOracleType>::Write(const TLobObjectType& content)
2714 {
2715  unsigned int res = 0;
2716 
2717  if (content.size() > 0)
2718  {
2719  res = Check(OCI_LobWrite(*this, static_cast<AnyPointer>(const_cast<typename TLobObjectType::value_type *>(&content[0])), static_cast<unsigned int>(content.size())));
2720  }
2721 
2722  return res;
2723 }
2724 
2725 template<class TLobObjectType, int TLobOracleType>
2726 inline void Lob<TLobObjectType, TLobOracleType>::Append(const Lob& other)
2727 {
2728  Check(OCI_LobAppendLob(*this, other));
2729 }
2730 
2731 template<class TLobObjectType, int TLobOracleType>
2732 inline unsigned int Lob<TLobObjectType, TLobOracleType>::Append(const TLobObjectType& content)
2733 {
2734  unsigned int res = 0;
2735 
2736  if (content.size() > 0)
2737  {
2738  Check(OCI_LobAppend(*this, static_cast<AnyPointer>(const_cast<typename TLobObjectType::value_type *>(&content[0])), static_cast<unsigned int>(content.size())));
2739  }
2740 
2741  return res;
2742 }
2743 
2744 template<class TLobObjectType, int TLobOracleType>
2745 inline bool Lob<TLobObjectType, TLobOracleType>::Seek(SeekMode seekMode, big_uint offset)
2746 {
2747  return (Check(OCI_LobSeek(*this, offset, seekMode)) == TRUE);
2748 }

2756

2886  SetInfos(directory, name);
2887 }

3064 inline Reference Object::GetReference() const
3065 {
3066  TypeInfo typeInfo = GetTypeInfo();
3067  Connection connection = typeInfo.GetConnection();
3068 
3069  OCI_Ref *pRef = OCI_RefCreate(connection, typeInfo);
3070 
3071  Check(OCI_ObjectGetSelfRef(*this, pRef));
3072 
3073  return Reference(pRef, GetHandle());
3074 }

3077 {
3078  return ObjectType(static_cast<ObjectType::type>(Check(OCI_ObjectGetType(*this))));
3079 }

3122 
3123 template<>
3124 inline float Object::Get<float>(const ostring& name) const
3125 {
3126  return Check(OCI_ObjectGetFloat(*this, name.c_str()));
3127 }

3195 template<>
3196 inline Raw Object::Get<Raw>(const ostring& name) const
3197 {
3198  unsigned int size = Check(OCI_ObjectGetRawSize(*this, name.c_str()));
3199 
3200  ManagedBuffer<unsigned char> buffer(size + 1);
3201 
3202  size = static_cast<unsigned int>(Check(OCI_ObjectGetRaw(*this, name.c_str(), static_cast<AnyPointer>(buffer), size)));
3203 
3204  return MakeRaw(buffer, size);
3205 }

3209 {
3210  return TDataType(Check(OCI_ObjectGetColl(*this, name.c_str())), GetHandle());
3211 }

3326 
3327 template<>
3328 inline void Object::Set<Raw>(const ostring& name, const Raw &value)
3329 {
3330  if (value.size() > 0)
3331  {
3332  Check(OCI_ObjectSetRaw(*this, name.c_str(), static_cast<AnyPointer>(const_cast<Raw::value_type *>(&value[0])), static_cast<unsigned int>(value.size())));
3333  }
3334  else
3335  {
3336  Check(OCI_ObjectSetRaw(*this, name.c_str(), NULL, 0));
3337  }
3338 }
3339 
3340 template<class TDataType>
3341 inline void Object::Set(const ostring& name, const TDataType &value)
3342 {
3343  Check(OCI_ObjectSetColl(*this, name.c_str(), value));
3344 }
3345 
3346 inline ostring Object::ToString() const
3347 {
3348  if (!IsNull())
3349  {
3350  unsigned int len = 0;
3351 
3352  Check(OCI_ObjectToText(*this, &len, 0));
3353 
3354  ManagedBuffer<otext> buffer(len + 1);
3355 
3356  Check(OCI_ObjectToText(*this, &len, buffer));
3357 
3358  return MakeString(static_cast<const otext *>(buffer));
3359  }
3360 
3361  return OCI_STRING_NULL;
3362 }
3363 
3364 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
3365  * Reference
3366  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
3367 
3368 inline Reference::Reference()
3369 {
3370 }
3371 
3372 inline Reference::Reference(const TypeInfo &typeInfo)
3373 {
3374  Connection connection = typeInfo.GetConnection();
3375  Acquire(Check(OCI_RefCreate(connection, typeInfo)), reinterpret_cast<HandleFreeFunc>(OCI_RefFree), 0, connection.GetHandle());
3376 }
3377 
3378 inline Reference::Reference(OCI_Ref *pRef, Handle *parent)
3379 {
3380  Acquire(pRef, 0, 0, parent);
3381 }
3382 
3383 inline TypeInfo Reference::GetTypeInfo() const
3384 {
3385  return TypeInfo(Check(OCI_RefGetTypeInfo(*this)));
3386 }
3387 
3388 inline Object Reference::GetObject() const
3389 {
3390  return Object(Check(OCI_RefGetObject(*this)), GetHandle());
3391 }
3392 
3393 inline Reference Reference::Clone() const
3394 {
3395  Reference result(GetTypeInfo());
3396 
3397  Check(OCI_RefAssign(result, *this));
3398 
3399  return result;
3400 }
3401 
3402 inline bool Reference::IsReferenceNull() const
3403 {
3404  return (Check(OCI_RefIsNull(*this)) == TRUE);
3405 }
3406 
3407 inline void Reference::SetReferenceNull()
3408 {
3409  Check(OCI_RefSetNull(*this));
3410 }
3411 
3412 inline ostring Reference::ToString() const
3413 {
3414  if (!IsNull())
3415  {
3416  unsigned int size = Check(OCI_RefGetHexSize(*this));
3417 
3418  ManagedBuffer<otext> buffer(size + 1);
3419 
3420  Check(OCI_RefToText(*this, size, buffer));
3421 
3422  return MakeString(static_cast<const otext *>(buffer));
3423  }
3424 
3425  return OCI_STRING_NULL;
3426 }
3427 
3428 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
3429  * Collection
3430  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
3431 
3432 template<class TDataType>
3433 inline Collection<TDataType>::Collection()
3434 {
3435 }
3436 
3437 template<class TDataType>
3438 inline Collection<TDataType>::Collection(const TypeInfo &typeInfo)
3439 {
3440  Acquire(Check(OCI_CollCreate(typeInfo)), reinterpret_cast<HandleFreeFunc>(OCI_CollFree), 0, typeInfo.GetConnection().GetHandle());
3441 }
3442 
3443 template<class TDataType>
3444 inline Collection<TDataType>::Collection(OCI_Coll *pColl, Handle *parent)
3445 {
3446  Acquire(pColl, 0, 0, parent);
3447 }
3448 
3449 template<class TDataType>
3450 inline Collection<TDataType> Collection<TDataType>::Clone() const
3451 {
3452  Collection<TDataType> result(GetTypeInfo());
3453 
3454  Check(OCI_CollAssign(result, *this));
3455 
3456  return result;
3457 }
3458 
3459 template<class TDataType>
3460 inline TypeInfo Collection<TDataType>::GetTypeInfo() const
3461 {
3462  return TypeInfo(Check(OCI_CollGetTypeInfo(*this)));
3463 }
3464 
3465 template<class TDataType>
3466 inline typename Collection<TDataType>::CollectionType Collection<TDataType>::GetType() const
3467 {
3468  return Collection<TDataType>::CollectionType(static_cast<typename Collection<TDataType>::CollectionType::type>(Check(OCI_CollGetType(*this))));
3469 }
3470 
3471 template<class TDataType>
3472 inline unsigned int Collection<TDataType>::GetMax() const
3473 {
3474  return Check(OCI_CollGetMax(*this));
3475 }
3476

3478 inline unsigned int Collection<TDataType>::GetSize() const
3479 
3480 {
3481  return Check(OCI_CollGetSize(*this));
3482 }
3483

3485 inline unsigned int Collection<TDataType>::GetCount() const
3486 
3487 {
3488  return Check(OCI_CollGetCount(*this));
3489 }
3490 
3491 template<class TDataType>
3492 inline void Collection<TDataType>::Truncate(unsigned int size)
3493 {
3494  Check(OCI_CollTrim(*this, size));
3495 }
3496 
3497 template<class TDataType>
3498 inline void Collection<TDataType>::Clear()
3499 {
3500  Check(OCI_CollClear(*this));
3501 }
3502 
3503 template<class TDataType>
3504 inline bool Collection<TDataType>::IsElementNull(unsigned int index) const
3505 {
3506  return (Check(OCI_ElemIsNull(Check(OCI_CollGetElem(*this, index)))) == TRUE);
3507 }
3508 
3509 template<class TDataType>
3510 inline void Collection<TDataType>::SetElementNull(unsigned int index)
3511 {
3512  Check(OCI_ElemSetNull(Check(OCI_CollGetElem(*this, index))));
3513 }
3514 
3515 template<class TDataType>
3516 inline bool Collection<TDataType>::Delete(unsigned int index) const
3517 {
3518  return (Check(OCI_CollDeleteElem(*this, index)) == TRUE);
3519 }
3520 
3521 template <class TDataType>
3522 inline typename Collection<TDataType>::Iterator Collection<TDataType>::begin()
3523 {
3524  return Iterator(*this, 1);
3525 }
3526 
3527 template <class TDataType>
3528 inline typename Collection<TDataType>::Iterator Collection<TDataType>::end()
3529 {
3530  return Iterator(*this, GetCount() + 1);
3531 }
3532 
3533 template <class TDataType>
3534 inline TDataType Collection<TDataType>::Get(unsigned int index) const
3535 {
3536  return GetElem(Check(OCI_CollGetElem(*this, index)), GetHandle());
3537 }
3538 
3539 template <class TDataType>
3540 inline void Collection<TDataType>::Set(unsigned int index, const TDataType &data)
3541 {
3542  OCI_Elem * elem = Check(OCI_CollGetElem(*this, index));
3543 
3544  SetElem(elem, data);
3545 
3546  Check(OCI_CollSetElem(*this, index, elem));
3547 }
3548 
3549 template <class TDataType>
3550 inline void Collection<TDataType>::Append(const TDataType &value)
3551 {
3552  OCI_Elem * elem = Check(OCI_ElemCreate(OCI_CollGetTypeInfo(*this)));
3553 
3554  SetElem(elem, value);
3555 
3556  Check(OCI_CollAppend(*this, elem));
3557  Check(OCI_ElemFree(elem));
3558 }
3559 
3560 template <>
3561 inline bool Collection<bool>::GetElem(OCI_Elem *elem, Handle *parent) const
3562 {
3563  ARG_NOT_USED(parent);
3564 
3565  return (Check(OCI_ElemGetBoolean(elem)) == TRUE);
3566 }
3567

3569 inline short Collection<short>::GetElem(OCI_Elem *elem, Handle *parent) const
3570 {
3571  ARG_NOT_USED(parent);
3572 
3573  return Check(OCI_ElemGetShort(elem));
3574 }

3640 template<>
3641 inline Raw Collection<Raw>::GetElem(OCI_Elem *elem, Handle *parent) const
3642 {
3643  ARG_NOT_USED(parent);
3644 
3645  unsigned int size = Check(OCI_ElemGetRawSize(elem));
3646 
3647  ManagedBuffer<unsigned char> buffer(size + 1);
3648 
3649  size = Check(OCI_ElemGetRaw(elem, static_cast<AnyPointer>(buffer), size));
3650 
3651  return MakeRaw(buffer, size);
3652 }

3773 template<>

3775 {

3777  {
3778  Check(OCI_ElemSetRaw(elem, static_cast<AnyPointer>(const_cast<Raw::value_type *>(&value[0])), static_cast<unsigned int>(value.size())));
3779  }
3780  else
3781  {
3782  Check(OCI_ElemSetRaw(elem, NULL, 0));
3783  }
3784 }

3828 template<>
3829 inline void Collection<Blob>::SetElem(OCI_Elem *elem, const Blob &value)
3830 {
3831  Check(OCI_ElemSetLob(elem, value));
3832 }
3833 
3834 template<>
3835 inline void Collection<File>::SetElem(OCI_Elem *elem, const File &value)
3836 {
3837  Check(OCI_ElemSetFile(elem, value));
3838 }
3839 
3840 template <class TDataType>
3841 inline void Collection<TDataType>::SetElem(OCI_Elem *elem, const TDataType &value)
3842 {
3843  Check(OCI_ElemSetColl(elem, value));
3844 }
3845 
3846 template<class TDataType>
3847 inline ostring Collection<TDataType>::ToString() const
3848 {
3849  if (!IsNull())
3850  {
3851  unsigned int len = 0;
3852 
3853  Check(OCI_CollToText(*this, &len, 0));
3854 
3855  ManagedBuffer<otext> buffer(len + 1);
3856 
3857  Check(OCI_CollToText(*this, &len, buffer));
3858 
3859  return MakeString(static_cast<const otext *>(buffer));
3860  }
3861 
3862  return OCI_STRING_NULL;
3863 }
3864 
3865 template<class TDataType>
3866 inline typename Collection<TDataType>::Element Collection<TDataType>::operator [] (unsigned int index)
3867 {
3868  return Element(*this, index);
3869 }
3870 
3871 template<class TDataType>
3872 inline Collection<TDataType>::Iterator::Iterator(Collection &coll, unsigned int pos) : _elem(coll, pos)
3873 {
3874 }
3875 
3876 template<class TDataType>
3877 inline Collection<TDataType>::Iterator::Iterator(const Iterator& other) : _elem(other._elem)
3878 {
3879 }
3880 
3881 template<class TDataType>
3882 inline bool Collection<TDataType>::Iterator::operator== (const Iterator& other)
3883 {
3884  return _elem._pos == other._elem._pos && (static_cast<OCI_Coll *>(_elem._coll)) == (static_cast<OCI_Coll *>(other._elem._coll));
3885 
3886 }
3887 
3888 template<class TDataType>
3889 inline bool Collection<TDataType>::Iterator::operator!= (const Iterator& other)
3890 {
3891  return !(*this == other);
3892 }
3893 
3894 template<class TDataType>
3895 inline typename Collection<TDataType>::Element& Collection<TDataType>::Iterator::operator*()
3896 {
3897  return _elem;
3898 }
3899 
3900 template<class TDataType>
3901 inline typename Collection<TDataType>::Iterator & Collection<TDataType>::Iterator::operator--()
3902 {
3903  _elem._pos--;
3904  return (*this);
3905 }
3906 
3907 template<class TDataType>
3908 inline typename Collection<TDataType>::Iterator Collection<TDataType>::Iterator::operator--(int)
3909 {
3910  Iterator old(*this);
3911  --(*this);
3912  return old;
3913 }
3914 
3915 template<class TDataType>
3916 inline typename Collection<TDataType>::Iterator & Collection<TDataType>::Iterator::operator++()
3917 {
3918  ++_elem._pos;
3919  return (*this);
3920 }
3921 
3922 template<class TDataType>
3923 inline typename Collection<TDataType>::Iterator Collection<TDataType>::Iterator::operator++(int)
3924 {
3925  Iterator old(*this);
3926  ++(*this);
3927  return old;
3928 }
3929 
3930 template<class TDataType>
3931 inline Collection<TDataType>::Element::Element(Collection &coll, unsigned int pos) : _coll(coll), _pos(pos)
3932 {
3933 
3934 }
3935 
3936 template<class TDataType>
3937 inline Collection<TDataType>::Element::operator TDataType() const
3938 {
3939  return _coll.Get(_pos);
3940 }
3941 
3942 template<class TDataType>
3943 inline typename Collection<TDataType>::Element& Collection<TDataType>::Element::operator = (TDataType value)
3944 {
3945  _coll.Set(_pos, value);
3946  return *this;
3947 }
3948 
3949 template<class TDataType>
3950 inline bool Collection<TDataType>::Element::IsNull() const
3951 {
3952  return _coll->IsElementNull(_pos);
3953 }
3954 
3955 template<class TDataType>
3956 inline void Collection<TDataType>::Element::SetNull()
3957 {
3958  _coll->SetElementNull(_pos);
3959 }

3971 inline Long<TLongObjectType, TLongOracleType>::Long(const Statement &statement)
3972 {
3973  Acquire(Check(OCI_LongCreate(statement, TLongOracleType)), reinterpret_cast<HandleFreeFunc>(OCI_LongFree), 0, statement.GetHandle());
3974 }

3977 inline Long<TLongObjectType, TLongOracleType>::Long(OCI_Long *pLong, Handle* parent)
3978 {
3979  Acquire(pLong, 0, 0, parent);
3980 }
3981 
3982 template<class TLongObjectType, int TLongOracleType>
3983 inline unsigned int Long<TLongObjectType, TLongOracleType>::Write(const TLongObjectType& content)
3984 {
3985  unsigned int res = 0;
3986 
3987  if (content.size() > 0)
3988  {
3989  res = Check(OCI_LongWrite(*this, static_cast<AnyPointer>(const_cast<typename TLongObjectType::value_type *>(&content[0])), static_cast<unsigned int>(content.size())));
3990  }
3991 
3992  return res;
3993 }
3994 
3995 template<class TLongObjectType, int TLongOracleType>
3996 inline unsigned int Long<TLongObjectType, TLongOracleType>::GetLength() const
3997 {
3998  return Check(OCI_LongGetSize(*this));
3999 }

4005 }

4008 inline Raw Long<Raw, LongBinary>::GetContent() const
4009 {
4010  return MakeRaw(Check(OCI_LongGetBuffer(*this)), GetLength());
4011 }

4094 inline void BindArray::SetVector(std::vector<TObjectType> & vector, unsigned int elemSize)
4095 {
4096  _object = new BindArrayObject<TObjectType, TDataType>(GetStatement(), GetName(), vector, GetMode(), elemSize);
4097 }

4100 {

4104 template <class TObjectType, class TDataType>
4105 inline TDataType * BindArray::GetData () const
4106 {

4108 }

4110 inline void BindArray::SetInData()
4111 {
4112  if (GetMode() & OCI_BDM_IN)
4113  {
4114  _object->SetInData();
4115  }
4116 }

4121  {

4126 template <class TObjectType, class TDataType>
4127 inline BindArray::BindArrayObject<TObjectType, TDataType>::BindArrayObject(const Statement &statement, const ostring& name, std::vector<TObjectType> &vector, unsigned int mode, unsigned int elemSize)
4128  : _pStatement(statement), _name(name), _vector(vector), _data(0), _mode(mode), _elemCount(statement.GetBindArraySize()), _elemSize(elemSize)
4129 {
4130  AllocData();
4131 }
4132 
4133 template <class TObjectType, class TDataType>
4134 inline BindArray::BindArrayObject<TObjectType, TDataType>::~BindArrayObject()
4135 {
4136  FreeData();
4137 }
4138 
4139 template <class TObjectType, class TDataType>
4140 inline void BindArray::BindArrayObject<TObjectType, TDataType>::AllocData()
4141 {
4142  _data = new TDataType[_elemCount];
4143 
4144  memset(_data, 0, sizeof(TDataType) * _elemCount);
4145 }
4146 
4147 template<>
4148 inline void BindArray::BindArrayObject<ostring, otext>::AllocData()
4149 {
4150  _data = new otext[_elemSize * _elemCount];
4151 
4152  memset(_data, 0, _elemSize * _elemCount * sizeof(otext));
4153 }
4154 
4155 template<>
4156 inline void BindArray::BindArrayObject<Raw, unsigned char> ::AllocData()
4157 {
4158  _data = new unsigned char[_elemSize * _elemCount];
4159 
4160  memset(_data, 0, _elemSize * _elemCount * sizeof(unsigned char));
4161 }
4162 
4163 template <class TObjectType, class TDataType>
4164 inline void BindArray::BindArrayObject<TObjectType, TDataType>::FreeData()
4165 {
4166  delete [] _data ;
4167 }
4168 
4169 template <class TObjectType, class TDataType>
4170 inline void BindArray::BindArrayObject<TObjectType, TDataType>::SetInData()
4171 {
4172  typename std::vector<TObjectType>::iterator it, it_end;
4173 
4174  unsigned int index = 0;
4175  unsigned int currElemCount = Check(OCI_BindArrayGetSize(_pStatement));
4176 
4177  for (it = _vector.begin(), it_end = _vector.end(); it != it_end && index < _elemCount && index < currElemCount; ++it, ++index)
4178  {
4179  _data[index] = BindValue<TDataType>( *it);
4180  }
4181 }
4182 
4183 template<>
4184 inline void BindArray::BindArrayObject<ostring, otext>::SetInData()
4185 {
4186  std::vector<ostring>::iterator it, it_end;
4187 
4188  unsigned int index = 0;
4189  unsigned int currElemCount = Check(OCI_BindArrayGetSize(_pStatement));
4190 
4191  for (it = _vector.begin(), it_end = _vector.end(); it != it_end && index < _elemCount && index < currElemCount; ++it, ++index)
4192  {
4193  const ostring & value = *it;
4194 
4195  memcpy( _data + (_elemSize * index), value.c_str(), (value.size() + 1) * sizeof(otext));
4196  }
4197 }
4198 
4199 template<>
4200 inline void BindArray::BindArrayObject<Raw, unsigned char>::SetInData()
4201 {
4202  std::vector<Raw>::iterator it, it_end;
4203 
4204  unsigned int index = 0;
4205  unsigned int currElemCount = Check(OCI_BindArrayGetSize(_pStatement));
4206 
4207  for (it = _vector.begin(), it_end = _vector.end(); it != it_end && index < _elemCount && index < currElemCount; ++it, ++index)
4208  {
4209  Raw & value = *it;
4210 
4211  if (value.size() > 0)
4212  {
4213  memcpy(_data + (_elemSize * index), &value[0], value.size());
4214  }
4215 
4216  OCI_BindSetDataSizeAtPos(OCI_GetBind2(_pStatement, GetName().c_str()), index + 1, static_cast<unsigned int>(value.size()));
4217  }
4218 }
4219 
4220 template <class TObjectType, class TDataType>
4221 inline void BindArray::BindArrayObject<TObjectType, TDataType>::SetOutData()
4222 {
4223  typename std::vector<TObjectType>::iterator it, it_end;
4224 
4225  unsigned int index = 0;
4226  unsigned int currElemCount = Check(OCI_BindArrayGetSize(_pStatement));
4227 
4228  for (it = _vector.begin(), it_end = _vector.end(); it != it_end && index < _elemCount && index < currElemCount; ++it, ++index)
4229  {
4230  TObjectType& object = *it;
4231 
4232  object = static_cast<TDataType>(_data[index]);
4233  }
4234 }
4235 
4236 template<>
4237 inline void BindArray::BindArrayObject<Raw, unsigned char>::SetOutData()
4238 {
4239  std::vector<Raw>::iterator it, it_end;
4240 
4241  OCI_Bind *pBind = Check(OCI_GetBind2(_pStatement, GetName().c_str()));
4242 
4243  unsigned int index = 0;
4244  unsigned int currElemCount = Check(OCI_BindArrayGetSize(_pStatement));
4245 
4246  for (it = _vector.begin(), it_end = _vector.end(); it != it_end && index < _elemCount && index < currElemCount; ++it, ++index)
4247  {
4248  unsigned char *currData = _data + (_elemSize * index);
4249 
4250  (*it).assign(currData, currData + Check(OCI_BindGetDataSizeAtPos(pBind, index + 1)));
4251  }
4252 }
4253 
4254 template <class TObjectType, class TDataType>
4255 inline ostring BindArray::BindArrayObject<TObjectType, TDataType>::GetName()
4256 {
4257  return _name;
4258 }
4259 
4260 template <class TObjectType, class TDataType>
4261 inline BindArray::BindArrayObject<TObjectType, TDataType>:: operator std::vector<TObjectType> & () const
4262 {
4263  return _vector;
4264 }
4265 
4266 template <class TObjectType, class TDataType>
4267 inline BindArray::BindArrayObject<TObjectType, TDataType>:: operator TDataType * () const
4268 {
4269  return _data;
4270 }

4272 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
4273  * BindObjectAdaptor
4274  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
4275 
4276 template <class TNativeType, class TObjectType>
4277 inline void BindObjectAdaptor<TNativeType, TObjectType>::SetInData()
4278 {
4279  if (GetMode() & OCI_BDM_IN)
4280  {
4281  size_t size = _object.size();
4282 
4283  if (size > _size)
4284  {
4285  size = _size;
4286  }
4287 
4288  if (size > 0)
4289  {
4290  memcpy(_data, &_object[0], size * sizeof(TNativeType));
4291  }
4292 
4293  _data[size] = 0;
4294  }
4295 }
4296 
4297 template <class TNativeType, class TObjectType>
4298 inline void BindObjectAdaptor<TNativeType, TObjectType>::SetOutData()
4299 {
4300  if (GetMode() & OCI_BDM_OUT)
4301  {
4302  size_t size = Check(OCI_BindGetDataSize(Check(OCI_GetBind2(_pStatement, _name.c_str()))));
4303 
4304  _object.assign(_data, _data + size);
4305  }
4306 }
4307 
4308 template <class TNativeType, class TObjectType>
4309 inline BindObjectAdaptor<TNativeType, TObjectType>::BindObjectAdaptor(const Statement &statement, const ostring& name, unsigned int mode, TObjectType &object, unsigned int size) :
4310  BindObject(statement, name, mode),
4311  _object(object),
4312  _data(new TNativeType[size]),
4313  _size(size)
4314 {
4315  memset(_data, 0, _size * sizeof(TNativeType));
4316 }
4317 
4318 template <class TNativeType, class TObjectType>
4319 inline BindObjectAdaptor<TNativeType, TObjectType>::~BindObjectAdaptor()
4320 {
4321  delete [] _data;
4322 }
4323 
4324 template <class TNativeType, class TObjectType>
4325 inline BindObjectAdaptor<TNativeType, TObjectType>::operator TNativeType *() const
4326 {
4327  return _data;
4328 }
4329

4331  * BindTypeAdaptor
4332  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

4336 {
4337  if (GetMode() & OCI_BDM_IN)
4338  {
4339  *_data = static_cast<TNativeType>(_object);
4340  }
4341 }
4342 
4343 template <class TNativeType, class TObjectType>
4344 inline void BindTypeAdaptor<TNativeType, TObjectType>::SetOutData()
4345 {
4346  if (GetMode() & OCI_BDM_OUT)
4347  {
4348  _object = static_cast<TObjectType>(*_data);
4349  }
4350 }
4351 
4352 template <class TNativeType, class TObjectType>
4353 inline BindTypeAdaptor<TNativeType, TObjectType>::BindTypeAdaptor(const Statement &statement, const ostring& name, unsigned int mode, TObjectType &object) :
4354 BindObject(statement, name, mode),
4355 _object(object),
4356 _data(new TNativeType)
4357 {
4358 
4359 }

4365 }

4367 template <class TNativeType, class TObjectType>

4370  return _data;
4371 }
4372 
4373 template <>
4374 inline void BindTypeAdaptor<boolean, bool>::SetInData()
4375 {
4376  if (GetMode() & OCI_BDM_IN)
4377  {
4378  *_data = (_object == true);
4379  }
4380 }
4381 
4382 template <>
4383 inline void BindTypeAdaptor<boolean, bool>::SetOutData()
4384 {
4385  if (GetMode() & OCI_BDM_OUT)
4386  {
4387  _object = (*_data == TRUE);
4388  }
4389 }

4391 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
4392  * BindsHolder
4393  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
4394 
4395 inline BindsHolder::BindsHolder(const Statement &statement) : _bindObjects(), _pStatement(statement)
4396 {
4397 
4398 }
4399 
4400 inline BindsHolder::~BindsHolder()
4401 {
4402  Clear();
4403 }
4404 
4405 inline void BindsHolder::Clear()
4406 {
4407  std::vector<BindObject *>::iterator it, it_end;
4408 
4409  for(it = _bindObjects.begin(), it_end = _bindObjects.end(); it != it_end; ++it)
4410  {
4411  delete (*it);
4412  }
4413 
4414  _bindObjects.clear();
4415 }
4416 
4417 inline void BindsHolder::AddBindObject(BindObject *bindObject)
4418 {
4419  if (Check(OCI_IsRebindingAllowed(_pStatement)))
4420  {
4421  std::vector<BindObject *>::iterator it, it_end;
4422 
4423  for(it = _bindObjects.begin(), it_end = _bindObjects.end(); it != it_end; ++it)
4424  {
4425  if ((*it)->GetName() == bindObject->GetName())
4426  {
4427  _bindObjects.erase(it);
4428  break;
4429  }
4430  }
4431  }
4432 
4433  _bindObjects.push_back(bindObject);
4434 }
4435 
4436 inline void BindsHolder::SetOutData()
4437 {
4438  std::vector<BindObject *>::iterator it, it_end;
4439 
4440  for(it = _bindObjects.begin(), it_end = _bindObjects.end(); it != it_end; ++it)
4441  {
4442  (*it)->SetOutData();
4443  }
4444 }
4445 
4446 inline void BindsHolder::SetInData()
4447 {
4448  std::vector<BindObject *>::iterator it, it_end;
4449 
4450  for(it = _bindObjects.begin(), it_end = _bindObjects.end(); it != it_end; ++it)
4451  {
4452  (*it)->SetInData();
4453  }
4454 }

4458  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

4463 }

4465 inline ostring BindInfo::GetName() const
4466 {
4467  return MakeString(Check(OCI_BindGetName(*this)));
4468 }
4469 
4470 inline DataType BindInfo::GetType() const
4471 {
4472  return DataType(static_cast<DataType::type>(Check(OCI_BindGetType(*this))));
4473 }

4476 {
4477  return Check(OCI_BindGetSubtype(*this));
4478 }
4479

4481 {
4482  return Check(OCI_BindGetDataCount(*this));
4483 }

4486 {
4487  return Statement(Check(OCI_BindGetStatement(*this)));
4488 }
4489 
4490 inline void BindInfo::SetDataNull(bool value, unsigned int index)
4491 {
4492  if (value)
4493  {
4494  Check(OCI_BindSetNullAtPos(*this, index));
4495  }
4496  else
4497  {
4498  Check(OCI_BindSetNotNullAtPos(*this, index));
4499  }
4500 }
4501 
4502 inline bool BindInfo::IsDataNull(unsigned int index) const
4503 {
4504  return (Check(OCI_BindIsNullAtPos(*this, index)) == TRUE);
4505 }
4506 
4507 inline void BindInfo::SetCharsetForm(CharsetForm value)
4508 {
4509  Check(OCI_BindSetCharsetForm(*this, value));
4510 }
4511 
4512 inline BindInfo::BindDirection BindInfo::GetDirection() const
4513 {
4514  return BindDirection(static_cast<BindDirection::type>(Check(OCI_BindGetDirection(*this))));
4515 }

4517 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
4518  * Statement
4519  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

4522 {

4524 
4525 inline Statement::Statement(const Connection &connection)
4526 {
4527  Acquire(Check(OCI_StatementCreate(connection)), reinterpret_cast<HandleFreeFunc>(OCI_StatementFree), OnFreeSmartHandle, connection.GetHandle());
4528 }
4529 
4530 inline Statement::Statement(OCI_Statement *stmt, Handle *parent)
4531 {
4532  Acquire(stmt, reinterpret_cast<HandleFreeFunc>(parent ? OCI_StatementFree : 0), OnFreeSmartHandle, parent);
4533 }
4534 
4535 inline Connection Statement::GetConnection() const
4536 {
4537  return Connection(Check(OCI_StatementGetConnection(*this)), 0);
4538 }
4539 
4540 inline void Statement::Describe(const ostring& sql)
4541 {
4542  ClearBinds();
4543  ReleaseResultsets();
4544  Check(OCI_Describe(*this, sql.c_str()));
4545 }
4546 
4547 inline void Statement::Parse(const ostring& sql)
4548 {
4549  ClearBinds();
4550  ReleaseResultsets();
4551  Check(OCI_Parse(*this, sql.c_str()));
4552 }
4553 
4554 inline void Statement::Prepare(const ostring& sql)
4555 {
4556  ClearBinds();
4557  ReleaseResultsets();
4558  Check(OCI_Prepare(*this, sql.c_str()));
4559 }
4560 
4561 inline void Statement::ExecutePrepared()
4562 {
4563  ReleaseResultsets();
4564  SetInData();
4565  Check(OCI_Execute(*this));
4566  SetOutData();
4567 }
4568 
4569 template<class TFetchCallback>
4570 inline unsigned int Statement::ExecutePrepared(TFetchCallback callback)
4571 {
4572  ExecutePrepared();
4573 
4574  return Fetch(callback);
4575 }
4576 
4577 template<class TAdapter, class TFetchCallback>
4578 inline unsigned int Statement::ExecutePrepared(TFetchCallback callback, TAdapter adapter)
4579 {
4580  ExecutePrepared();
4581 
4582  return Fetch(callback, adapter);
4583 }
4584 
4585 inline void Statement::Execute(const ostring& sql)
4586 {
4587  ClearBinds();
4588  ReleaseResultsets();
4589  Check(OCI_ExecuteStmt(*this, sql.c_str()));
4590 }
4591 
4592 template<class TFetchCallback>
4593 inline unsigned int Statement::Execute(const ostring& sql, TFetchCallback callback)
4594 {
4595  Execute(sql);
4596 
4597  return Fetch(callback);
4598 }
4599 
4600 template<class TAdapter, class TFetchCallback>
4601 inline unsigned int Statement::Execute(const ostring& sql, TFetchCallback callback, TAdapter adapter)
4602 {
4603  Execute(sql);
4604 
4605  return Fetch(callback, adapter);
4606 }
4607 
4608 template<typename TFetchCallback>
4609 inline unsigned int Statement::Fetch(TFetchCallback callback)
4610 {
4611  unsigned int res = 0;
4612 
4613  Resultset rs = GetResultset();
4614 
4615  while (rs)
4616  {
4617  res += rs.ForEach(callback);
4618  rs = GetNextResultset();
4619  }
4620 
4621  return res;
4622 }
4623 
4624 template<class TAdapter, class TFetchCallback>
4625 inline unsigned int Statement::Fetch(TFetchCallback callback, TAdapter adapter)
4626 {
4627  unsigned int res = 0;
4628 
4629  Resultset rs = GetResultset();
4630 
4631  while (rs)
4632  {
4633  res += rs.ForEach(callback, adapter);
4634  rs = GetNextResultset();
4635  }
4636 
4637  return res;
4638 }
4639 
4640 inline unsigned int Statement::GetAffectedRows() const
4641 {
4642  return Check(OCI_GetAffectedRows(*this));
4643 }
4644 
4645 inline ostring Statement::GetSql() const
4646 {
4647  return MakeString(Check(OCI_GetSql(*this)));
4648 }
4649 
4650 inline Resultset Statement::GetResultset()
4651 {
4652  return Resultset(Check(OCI_GetResultset(*this)), GetHandle());
4653 }
4654 
4655 inline Resultset Statement::GetNextResultset()
4656 {
4657  return Resultset(Check(OCI_GetNextResultset(*this)), GetHandle());
4658 }
4659 
4660 inline void Statement::SetBindArraySize(unsigned int size)
4661 {
4662  Check(OCI_BindArraySetSize(*this, size));
4663 }
4664 
4665 inline unsigned int Statement::GetBindArraySize() const
4666 {
4667  return Check(OCI_BindArrayGetSize(*this));
4668 }
4669 
4670 inline void Statement::AllowRebinding(bool value)
4671 {
4672  Check(OCI_AllowRebinding(*this, value));
4673 }
4674 
4675 inline bool Statement::IsRebindingAllowed() const
4676 {
4677  return (Check(OCI_IsRebindingAllowed(*this)) == TRUE);
4678 }
4679 
4680 inline unsigned int Statement::GetBindIndex(const ostring& name) const
4681 {
4682  return Check(OCI_GetBindIndex(*this, name.c_str()));
4683 }

4686 {
4687  return Check(OCI_GetBindCount(*this));
4688 }
4689 
4690 inline BindInfo Statement::GetBind(unsigned int index) const
4691 {
4692  return BindInfo(Check(OCI_GetBind(*this, index)), GetHandle());
4693 }
4694 
4695 inline BindInfo Statement::GetBind(const ostring& name) const
4696 {
4697  return BindInfo(Check(OCI_GetBind2(*this, name.c_str())), GetHandle());
4698 }
4699 
4700 template <typename TBindMethod, class TDataType>
4701 inline void Statement::Bind (TBindMethod &method, const ostring& name, TDataType& value, BindInfo::BindDirection mode)
4702 {
4703  Check(method(*this, name.c_str(), &value));
4704  SetLastBindMode(mode);
4705 }
4706 
4707 template <typename TBindMethod, class TObjectType, class TDataType>
4708 inline void Statement::Bind (TBindMethod &method, const ostring& name, TObjectType& value, BindValue<TDataType> datatype, BindInfo::BindDirection mode)
4709 {
4710  ARG_NOT_USED(datatype);
4711 
4712  Check(method(*this, name.c_str(), static_cast<TDataType>(value)));
4713  SetLastBindMode(mode);
4714 }
4715 
4716 template <typename TBindMethod, class TObjectType, class TDataType>
4717 inline void Statement::Bind (TBindMethod &method, const ostring& name, std::vector<TObjectType> &values, BindValue<TDataType> datatype, BindInfo::BindDirection mode)
4718 {
4719  ARG_NOT_USED(datatype);
4720 
4721  BindArray * bnd = new BindArray(*this, name, mode);
4722  bnd->SetVector<TObjectType, TDataType>(values, sizeof(TDataType));
4723 
4724  boolean res = method(*this, name.c_str(), static_cast<TDataType *>(bnd->GetData<TObjectType, TDataType>()), 0);
4725 
4726  if (res)
4727  {
4728  BindsHolder *bindsHolder = GetBindsHolder(true);
4729  bindsHolder->AddBindObject(bnd);
4730  SetLastBindMode(mode);
4731  }
4732  else
4733  {
4734  delete bnd;
4735  }
4736 
4737  Check(res);
4738 }
4739 
4740 template <typename TBindMethod, class TObjectType, class TDataType, class TElemType>
4741 inline void Statement::Bind (TBindMethod &method, const ostring& name, std::vector<TObjectType> &values, BindValue<TDataType> datatype, BindInfo::BindDirection mode, TElemType type)
4742 {
4743  ARG_NOT_USED(datatype);
4744 
4745  BindArray * bnd = new BindArray(*this, name, mode);
4746  bnd->SetVector<TObjectType, TDataType>(values, sizeof(TDataType));
4747 
4748  boolean res = method(*this, name.c_str(), static_cast<TDataType *>(bnd->GetData<TObjectType, TDataType>()), type, 0);
4749 
4750  if (res)
4751  {
4752  BindsHolder *bindsHolder = GetBindsHolder(true);
4753  bindsHolder->AddBindObject(bnd);
4754  SetLastBindMode(mode);
4755  }
4756  else
4757  {
4758  delete bnd;
4759  }
4760 
4761  Check(res);
4762 }
4763 
4764 template <>
4765 inline void Statement::Bind<bool>(const ostring& name, bool &value, BindInfo::BindDirection mode)
4766 {
4767  BindTypeAdaptor<boolean, bool> * bnd = new BindTypeAdaptor<boolean, bool>(*this, name, mode, value);
4768 
4769  boolean res = OCI_BindBoolean(*this, name.c_str(), static_cast<boolean *>(*bnd));
4770 
4771  if (res)
4772  {
4773  BindsHolder *bindsHolder = GetBindsHolder(true);
4774  bindsHolder->AddBindObject(bnd);
4775  SetLastBindMode(mode);
4776  }
4777  else
4778  {
4779  delete bnd;
4780  }
4781 
4782  Check(res);
4783 }
4784

4918 
4919 template <>
4920 inline void Statement::Bind<ostring, unsigned int>(const ostring& name, ostring &value, unsigned int maxSize, BindInfo::BindDirection mode)
4921 {
4922  if (maxSize == 0)
4923  {
4924  maxSize = static_cast<unsigned int>(value.size());
4925  }
4926 
4927  value.reserve(maxSize);
4928 
4929  BindObjectAdaptor<otext, ostring> * bnd = new BindObjectAdaptor<otext, ostring>(*this, name, mode, value, maxSize + 1);
4930 
4931  boolean res = OCI_BindString(*this, name.c_str(), static_cast<otext *>(*bnd), maxSize);
4932 
4933  if (res)
4934  {
4935  BindsHolder *bindsHolder = GetBindsHolder(true);
4936  bindsHolder->AddBindObject(bnd);
4937  SetLastBindMode(mode);
4938  }
4939  else
4940  {
4941  delete bnd;
4942  }
4943 
4944  Check(res);
4945 }
4946 
4947 template <>
4948 inline void Statement::Bind<ostring, int>(const ostring& name, ostring &value, int maxSize, BindInfo::BindDirection mode)
4949 {
4950  Bind<ostring, unsigned int>(name, value, static_cast<unsigned int>(maxSize), mode);
4951 }
4952 
4953 template <>
4954 inline void Statement::Bind<Raw, unsigned int>(const ostring& name, Raw &value, unsigned int maxSize, BindInfo::BindDirection mode)
4955 {
4956  if (maxSize == 0)
4957  {
4958  maxSize = static_cast<unsigned int>(value.size());
4959  }
4960 
4961  value.reserve(maxSize);
4962 
4963  BindObjectAdaptor<unsigned char, Raw> * bnd = new BindObjectAdaptor<unsigned char, Raw>(*this, name, mode, value, maxSize);
4964 
4965  boolean res = OCI_BindRaw(*this, name.c_str(), static_cast<unsigned char *>(*bnd), maxSize);
4966 
4967  if (res)
4968  {
4969  BindsHolder *bindsHolder = GetBindsHolder(true);
4970  bindsHolder->AddBindObject(bnd);
4971  SetLastBindMode(mode);
4972  }
4973  else
4974  {
4975  delete bnd;
4976  }
4977 
4978  Check(res);
4979 }

4983 {

4985 }
