5112 
5113 template <>
5114 inline void Statement::Bind<ostring, unsigned int>(const ostring& name, std::vector<ostring> &values, unsigned int maxSize, BindInfo::BindDirection mode)
5115 {
5116  BindArray * bnd = new BindArray(*this, name, mode);
5117  bnd->SetVector<ostring, otext>(values, maxSize+1);
5118 
5119  boolean res = OCI_BindArrayOfStrings(*this, name.c_str(), bnd->GetData<ostring, otext>(), maxSize, 0);
5120 
5121  if (res)
5122  {
5123  BindsHolder *bindsHolder = GetBindsHolder(true);
5124  bindsHolder->AddBindObject(bnd);
5125  SetLastBindMode(mode);
5126  }
5127  else
5128  {
5129  delete bnd;
5130  }
5131 
5132  Check(res);
5133 }
5134 
5135 template <>
5136 inline void Statement::Bind<ostring, int>(const ostring& name, std::vector<ostring> &values, int maxSize, BindInfo::BindDirection mode)
5137 {
5138  Bind<ostring, unsigned int>(name, values, static_cast<unsigned int>(maxSize), mode);
5139 }
5140 
5141 template <>
5142 inline void Statement::Bind<Raw, unsigned int>(const ostring& name, std::vector<Raw> &values, unsigned int maxSize, BindInfo::BindDirection mode)
5143 {
5144  BindArray * bnd = new BindArray(*this, name, mode);
5145  bnd->SetVector<Raw, unsigned char>(values, maxSize);
5146 
5147  boolean res = OCI_BindArrayOfRaws(*this, name.c_str(), bnd->GetData<Raw, unsigned char>(), maxSize, 0);
5148 
5149  if (res)
5150  {
5151  BindsHolder *bindsHolder = GetBindsHolder(true);
5152  bindsHolder->AddBindObject(bnd);
5153  SetLastBindMode(mode);
5154  }
5155  else
5156  {
5157  delete bnd;
5158  }
5159 
5160  Check(res);
5161 }
5162 
5163 template<class TDataType>
5164 void Statement::Bind(const ostring& name, std::vector<TDataType> &values, TypeInfo &typeInfo, BindInfo::BindDirection mode)
5165 {
5166  Bind(OCI_BindArrayOfColls, name, values, BindValue<OCI_Coll *>(), mode, static_cast<OCI_TypeInfo *>(typeInfo));
5167 }
5168

5396 
5397 inline void Statement::GetBatchErrors(std::vector<Exception> &exceptions)
5398 {
5399  exceptions.clear();
5400 
5401  OCI_Error *err = Check(OCI_GetBatchError(*this));
5402 
5403  while (err)
5404  {
5405  exceptions.push_back(Exception(err));
5406 
5407  err = Check(OCI_GetBatchError(*this));
5408  }
5409 }
5410 
5411 inline void Statement::ClearBinds()
5412 {
5413  BindsHolder *bindsHolder = GetBindsHolder(false);
5414 
5415  if (bindsHolder)
5416  {
5417  bindsHolder->Clear();
5418  }
5419 }
5420 
5421 inline void Statement::SetOutData()
5422 {
5423  BindsHolder *bindsHolder = GetBindsHolder(false);
5424 
5425  if (bindsHolder)
5426  {
5427  bindsHolder->SetOutData();
5428  }
5429 }
5430 
5431 inline void Statement::SetInData()
5432 {
5433  BindsHolder *bindsHolder = GetBindsHolder(false);
5434 
5435  if (bindsHolder)
5436  {
5437  bindsHolder->SetInData();
5438  }
5439 }
5440 
5441 inline void Statement::ReleaseResultsets()
5442 {
5443  if (_smartHandle)
5444  {
5445  Handle *handle = 0;
5446 
5447  while (_smartHandle->GetChildren().FindIf(IsResultsetHandle, handle))
5448  {
5449  if (handle)
5450  {
5451  handle->DetachFromHolders();
5452 
5453  delete handle;
5454 
5455  handle = 0;
5456  }
5457  }
5458  }
5459 }
5460 
5461 inline bool Statement::IsResultsetHandle(Handle *handle)
5462 {
5463  Resultset::SmartHandle *smartHandle = dynamic_cast<Resultset::SmartHandle *>(handle);
5464 
5465  return smartHandle != 0;
5466 }
5467 
5468 inline void Statement::OnFreeSmartHandle(SmartHandle *smartHandle)
5469 {
5470  if (smartHandle)
5471  {
5472  BindsHolder *bindsHolder = static_cast<BindsHolder *>(smartHandle->GetExtraInfos());
5473 
5474  smartHandle->SetExtraInfos(0);
5475 
5476  delete bindsHolder;
5477  }
5478 }
5479 
5480 inline void Statement::SetLastBindMode(BindInfo::BindDirection mode)
5481 {
5482  Check(OCI_BindSetDirection(Check(OCI_GetBind(*this, Check(OCI_GetBindCount(*this)))), mode));
5483 }
5484 
5485 inline BindsHolder * Statement::GetBindsHolder(bool create)
5486 {
5487  BindsHolder * bindsHolder = static_cast<BindsHolder *>(_smartHandle->GetExtraInfos());
5488 
5489  if (bindsHolder == 0 && create)
5490  {
5491  bindsHolder = new BindsHolder(*this);
5492  _smartHandle->SetExtraInfos(bindsHolder);
5493  }
5494 
5495  return bindsHolder;
5496 }
5497 
5498 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
5499  * Resultset
5500  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
5501 
5502 inline Resultset::Resultset(OCI_Resultset *resultset, Handle *parent)
5503 {
5504  Acquire(resultset, 0, 0, parent);
5505 }
5506 
5507 inline bool Resultset::Next()
5508 {
5509  return (Check(OCI_FetchNext(*this)) == TRUE);
5510 }
5511 
5512 inline bool Resultset::Prev()
5513 {
5514  return (Check(OCI_FetchPrev(*this)) == TRUE);
5515 }
5516 
5517 inline bool Resultset::First()
5518 {
5519  return (Check(OCI_FetchFirst(*this)) == TRUE);
5520 }
5521 
5522 inline bool Resultset::Last()
5523 {
5524  return (Check(OCI_FetchLast(*this)) == TRUE);
5525 }
5526 
5527 inline bool Resultset::Seek(SeekMode mode, int offset)
5528 {
5529  return (Check(OCI_FetchSeek(*this, mode, offset)) == TRUE);
5530 }
5531 
5532 inline unsigned int Resultset::GetCount() const
5533 {
5534  return Check(OCI_GetRowCount(*this));
5535 }
5536 
5537 inline unsigned int Resultset::GetCurrentRow() const
5538 {
5539  return Check(OCI_GetCurrentRow(*this));
5540 }
5541 
5542 inline unsigned int Resultset::GetColumnIndex(const ostring& name) const
5543 {
5544  return Check(OCI_GetColumnIndex(*this, name.c_str()));
5545 }
5546 
5547 inline unsigned int Resultset::GetColumnCount() const
5548 {
5549  return Check(OCI_GetColumnCount(*this));
5550 }
5551 
5552 inline Column Resultset::GetColumn(unsigned int index) const
5553 {
5554  return Column(Check(OCI_GetColumn(*this, index)), GetHandle());
5555 }
5556 
5557 inline Column Resultset::GetColumn(const ostring& name) const
5558 {
5559  return Column(Check(OCI_GetColumn2(*this, name.c_str())), GetHandle());
5560 }
5561 
5562 inline bool Resultset::IsColumnNull(unsigned int index) const
5563 {
5564  return (Check(OCI_IsNull(*this, index)) == TRUE);
5565 }
5566 
5567 inline bool Resultset::IsColumnNull(const ostring& name) const
5568 {
5569  return (Check(OCI_IsNull2(*this, name.c_str())) == TRUE);
5570 }
5571 
5572 inline Statement Resultset::GetStatement() const
5573 {
5574  return Statement( Check(OCI_ResultsetGetStatement(*this)), 0);
5575 }
5576 
5577 inline bool Resultset::operator ++ (int)
5578 {
5579  return Next();
5580 }
5581 
5582 inline bool Resultset::operator -- (int)
5583 {
5584  return Prev();
5585 }
5586 
5587 inline bool Resultset::operator += (int offset)
5588 {
5589  return Seek(Resultset::SeekRelative, offset);
5590 }
5591 
5592 inline bool Resultset::operator -= (int offset)
5593 {
5594  return Seek(Resultset::SeekRelative, -offset);
5595 }
5596 
5597 template<class TDataType>
5598 inline void Resultset::Get(unsigned int index, TDataType& value) const
5599 {
5600  value = Get<TDataType>(index);
5601 }
5602 
5603 template<class TDataType>
5604 inline void Resultset::Get(const ostring &name, TDataType& value) const
5605 {
5606  value = Get<TDataType>(name);
5607 }
5608 
5609 template<class TDataType, class TAdapter>
5610 inline bool Resultset::Get(TDataType& value, TAdapter adapter) const
5611 {
5612  return adapter(static_cast<const Resultset&>(*this), value);
5613 }
5614 
5615 template<class TCallback>
5616 inline unsigned int Resultset::ForEach(TCallback callback)
5617 {
5618  while (Next())
5619  {
5620  if (!callback(static_cast<const Resultset&>(*this)))
5621  {
5622  break;
5623  }
5624  }
5625 
5626  return GetCurrentRow();
5627 }
5628 
5629 template<class TAdapter, class TCallback>
5630 inline unsigned int Resultset::ForEach(TCallback callback, TAdapter adapter)
5631 {
5632  while (Next())
5633  {
5634  if (!callback(adapter(static_cast<const Resultset&>(*this))))
5635  {
5636  break;
5637  }
5638  }
5639 
5640  return GetCurrentRow();
5641 }
5642

5646  return Check(OCI_GetShort(*this, index));
5647 }

5650 inline short Resultset::Get<short>(const ostring& name) const
5651 {
5652  return Check(OCI_GetShort2(*this, name.c_str()));
5653 }

5750 
5751 template<>
5752 inline Raw Resultset::Get<Raw>(unsigned int index) const
5753 {
5754  unsigned int size = Check(OCI_GetDataLength(*this,index));
5755 
5756  ManagedBuffer<unsigned char> buffer(size + 1);
5757 
5758  size = Check(OCI_GetRaw(*this, index, static_cast<AnyPointer>(buffer), size));
5759 
5760  return MakeRaw(buffer, size);
5761 }
5762 
5763 template<>
5764 inline Raw Resultset::Get<Raw>(const ostring& name) const
5765 {
5766  unsigned int size = Check(OCI_GetDataLength(*this, Check(OCI_GetColumnIndex(*this, name.c_str()))));
5767 
5768  ManagedBuffer<unsigned char> buffer(size + 1);
5769 
5770  size = Check(OCI_GetRaw2(*this, name.c_str(), static_cast<AnyPointer>(buffer), size));
5771 
5772  return MakeRaw(buffer, size);
5773 }
5774

5777 {
5778  return Date(Check(OCI_GetDate(*this, index)), GetHandle());
5779 }

5900 
5901 template<>
5902 inline Clong Resultset::Get<Clong>(const ostring& name) const
5903 {
5904  return Clong(Check(OCI_GetLong2(*this,name.c_str())), GetHandle());
5905 }
5906 
5907 template<>
5908 inline Blong Resultset::Get<Blong>(unsigned int index) const
5909 {
5910  return Blong(Check(OCI_GetLong(*this, index)), GetHandle());
5911 }
5912 
5913 template<>
5914 inline Blong Resultset::Get<Blong>(const ostring& name) const
5915 {
5916  return Blong(Check(OCI_GetLong2(*this,name.c_str())), GetHandle());
5917 }
5918 
5919 template<class TDataType>
5920 inline TDataType Resultset::Get(unsigned int index) const
5921 {
5922  return TDataType(Check(OCI_GetColl(*this, index)), GetHandle());
5923 }
5924 
5925 template<class TDataType>
5926 inline TDataType Resultset::Get(const ostring& name) const
5927 {
5928  return TDataType(Check(OCI_GetColl2(*this, name.c_str())), GetHandle());
5929 }

5950 inline ostring Column::GetFullSQLType() const
5951 {

5953 
5954  ManagedBuffer<otext> buffer(size + 1);
5955 
5956  Check(OCI_ColumnGetFullSQLType(*this, buffer, size));
5957 
5958  return MakeString(static_cast<const otext *>(buffer));
5959 }

6021 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
6022  * Subscription
6023  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
6024 
6025 inline Subscription::Subscription()
6026 {
6027 
6028 }
6029 
6030 inline Subscription::Subscription(OCI_Subscription *pSubcription)
6031 {
6032  Acquire(pSubcription, 0, 0, 0);
6033 }
6034 
6035 inline void Subscription::Register(const Connection &connection, const ostring& name, ChangeTypes changeTypes, NotifyHandlerProc handler, unsigned int port, unsigned int timeout)
6036 {
6037  Acquire(Check(OCI_SubscriptionRegister(connection, name.c_str(), changeTypes.GetValues(),
6038  static_cast<POCI_NOTIFY> (handler != 0 ? Environment::NotifyHandler : 0 ), port, timeout)),
6039  reinterpret_cast<HandleFreeFunc>(OCI_SubscriptionUnregister), 0, 0);
6040 
6041  Environment::SetUserCallback<Subscription::NotifyHandlerProc>(static_cast<OCI_Subscription*>(*this), handler);
6042 }
6043 
6044 inline void Subscription::Unregister()
6045 {
6046  Environment::SetUserCallback<Subscription::NotifyHandlerProc>(static_cast<OCI_Subscription*>(*this), 0);
6047 
6048  Release();
6049 }
6050 
6051 inline void Subscription::Watch(const ostring& sql)
6052 {
6053  Statement st(GetConnection());
6054 
6055  st.Execute(sql);
6056 
6057  Check(OCI_SubscriptionAddStatement(*this, st));
6058 }
6059 
6060 inline ostring Subscription::GetName() const
6061 {
6062  return MakeString(Check(OCI_SubscriptionGetName(*this)));
6063 }
6064 
6065 inline unsigned int Subscription::GetTimeout() const
6066 {
6067  return Check(OCI_SubscriptionGetTimeout(*this));
6068 }
6069 
6070 inline unsigned int Subscription::GetPort() const
6071 {
6072  return Check(OCI_SubscriptionGetPort(*this));
6073 }
6074 
6075 inline Connection Subscription::GetConnection() const
6076 {
6077  return Connection(Check(OCI_SubscriptionGetConnection(*this)), 0);
6078 }

6183 
6184 template <>
6185 inline Raw Message::GetPayload<Raw>()
6186 {
6187  unsigned int size = 0;
6188 
6189  ManagedBuffer<unsigned char> buffer(size + 1);
6190 
6191  Check(OCI_MsgGetRaw(*this, static_cast<AnyPointer>(buffer), &size));
6192 
6193  return MakeRaw(buffer, size);
6194 }
6195 
6196 template <>
6197 inline void Message::SetPayload<Raw>(const Raw &value)
6198 {
6199  if (value.size() > 0)
6200  {
6201  Check(OCI_MsgSetRaw(*this, static_cast<AnyPointer>(const_cast<Raw::value_type *>(&value[0])), static_cast<unsigned int>(value.size())));
6202  }
6203  else
6204  {
6205  Check(OCI_MsgSetRaw(*this, NULL, 0));
6206  }
6207 }

6318 inline void Message::SetConsumers(std::vector<Agent> &agents)
6319 {
6320  size_t size = agents.size();
6321  ManagedBuffer<OCI_Agent*> buffer(size);
6322 
6323  OCI_Agent ** pAgents = static_cast<OCI_Agent **>(buffer);
6324 
6325  for (size_t i = 0; i < size; ++i)
6326  {
6327  pAgents[i] = static_cast<const Agent &>(agents[i]);
6328  }
6329 
6330  Check(OCI_MsgSetConsumers(*this, pAgents, static_cast<unsigned int>(size)));
6331 }

6497 inline void Dequeue::SetAgents(std::vector<Agent> &agents)
6498 {
6499  size_t size = agents.size();
6500  ManagedBuffer<OCI_Agent*> buffer(size);
6501 
6502  OCI_Agent ** pAgents = static_cast<OCI_Agent **>(buffer);
6503 
6504  for (size_t i = 0; i < size; ++i)
6505  {
6506  pAgents[i] = static_cast<const Agent &>(agents[i]);
6507  }
6508 
6509  Check(OCI_DequeueSetAgentList(*this, pAgents, static_cast<unsigned int>(size)));
6510 }

6512 inline void Dequeue::Subscribe(unsigned int port, unsigned int timeout, NotifyAQHandlerProc handler)
6513 {
6514  Check(OCI_DequeueSubscribe(*this, port, timeout, static_cast<POCI_NOTIFY_AQ>(handler != 0 ? Environment::NotifyHandlerAQ : 0 )));
6515 
6516  Environment::SetUserCallback<Dequeue::NotifyAQHandlerProc>(static_cast<OCI_Dequeue*>(*this), handler);
6517 }

6619 inline void DirectPath::SetNoLog(bool value)
6620 {
6621  Check(OCI_DirPathSetNoLog(*this, value));
6622 }

6627 }

6640 {

6642 }

6645 {
6646  return Check(OCI_DirPathGetErrorRow(*this));
6647 }
6648 
6649 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
6650  * Queue
6651  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
6652 
6653 inline void Queue::Create(const Connection &connection, const ostring& queue, const ostring& table, QueueType queueType, unsigned int maxRetries,
6654  unsigned int retryDelay, unsigned int retentionTime, bool dependencyTracking, const ostring& comment)
6655 {
6656  Check(OCI_QueueCreate(connection, queue.c_str(), table.c_str(), queueType, maxRetries, retryDelay, retentionTime, dependencyTracking, comment.c_str()));
6657 }
6658 
6659 inline void Queue::Alter(const Connection &connection, const ostring& queue, unsigned int maxRetries, unsigned int retryDelay, unsigned int retentionTime, const ostring& comment)
6660 {
6661  Check(OCI_QueueAlter(connection, queue.c_str(), maxRetries, retryDelay, retentionTime, comment.c_str()));
6662 }
6663 
6664 inline void Queue::Drop(const Connection &connection, const ostring& queue)
6665 {
6666  Check(OCI_QueueDrop(connection, queue.c_str()));
6667 }
6668 
6669 inline void Queue::Start(const Connection &connection, const ostring& queue, bool enableEnqueue, bool enableDequeue)
6670 {
6671  Check(OCI_QueueStart(connection, queue.c_str(), enableEnqueue, enableDequeue));
6672 }
6673 
6674 inline void Queue::Stop(const Connection &connection, const ostring& queue, bool stopEnqueue, bool stopDequeue, bool wait)
6675 {
6676  Check(OCI_QueueStop(connection, queue.c_str(), stopEnqueue, stopDequeue, wait));
6677 }
6678 
6679 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
6680  * QueueTable
6681  * --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
6682 
6683 inline void QueueTable::Create(const Connection &connection, const ostring& table, const ostring& payloadType, bool multipleConsumers, const ostring& storageClause, const ostring& sortList,
6684  GroupingMode groupingMode, const ostring& comment, unsigned int primaryInstance, unsigned int secondaryInstance, const ostring& compatible)
6685 
6686 {
6687  Check(OCI_QueueTableCreate(connection, table.c_str(), payloadType.c_str(), storageClause.c_str(), sortList.c_str(), multipleConsumers,
6688  groupingMode, comment.c_str(), primaryInstance, secondaryInstance, compatible.c_str()));
6689 }
6690 
6691 inline void QueueTable::Alter(const Connection &connection, const ostring& table, const ostring& comment, unsigned int primaryInstance, unsigned int secondaryInstance)
6692 {
6693  Check(OCI_QueueTableAlter(connection, table.c_str(), comment.c_str(), primaryInstance, secondaryInstance));
6694 }
6695 
6696 inline void QueueTable::Drop(const Connection &connection, const ostring& table, bool force)
6697 {
6698  Check(OCI_QueueTableDrop(connection, table.c_str(), force));
6699 }
6700 
6701 inline void QueueTable::Purge(const Connection &connection, const ostring& table, PurgeMode mode, const ostring& condition, bool block)
6702 {
6703  Check(OCI_QueueTablePurge(connection, table.c_str(), condition.c_str(), block, static_cast<unsigned int>(mode)));
6704 }
6705 
6706 inline void QueueTable::Migrate(const Connection &connection, const ostring& table, const ostring& compatible)
6707 {
6708  Check(OCI_QueueTableMigrate(connection, table.c_str(), compatible.c_str()));
6709 }
6710
